1678609Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Encrypts a given password and returns the encrypted dataDi2015NewLine    /// as a base64 string.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="plainText">An unencrypted string that needsDi2015NewLine    /// to be secured.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A base64 encoded string that represents the encryptedDi2015NewLine    /// binary data.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>This solution is not really secure as we areDi2015NewLine    /// keeping strings in memory. If runtime protection is essential,Di2015NewLine    /// <see cref="SecureString"/> should be used.</remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// <exception cref="ArgumentNullException">If <paramref name="plainText"/>Di2015NewLine    /// is a null reference.</exception>Di2015NewLine    public string Encrypt(string plainText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (plainText == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("plainText");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //encrypt dataDi2015NewLine        var data = Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(plainText);Di2015NewLine        byte[] encrypted = ProtectedData.Protect(data, null, Scope);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //return as base64 stringDi2015NewLine        return Convert.ToBase64String(encrypted);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Decrypts a given string.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="cipher">A base64 encoded string that was createdDi2015NewLine    /// through the <see cref="Encrypt(string)"/> orDi2015NewLine    /// <see cref="Encrypt(SecureString)"/> extension methods.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The decrypted string.</returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Keep in mind that the decrypted string remains in memoryDi2015NewLine    /// and makes your application vulnerable per se. If runtime protectionDi2015NewLine    /// is essential, <see cref="SecureString"/> should be used.</remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// <exception cref="ArgumentNullException">If <paramref name="cipher"/>Di2015NewLine    /// is a null reference.</exception>Di2015NewLine    public string Decrypt(string cipher)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (cipher == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("cipher");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //parse base64 stringDi2015NewLine        byte[] data = Convert.FromBase64String(cipher);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //decrypt dataDi2015NewLine        byte[] decrypted = ProtectedData.Unprotect(data, null, Scope);Di2015NewLine        return Encoding.Unicode.GetString(decrypted);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1684385Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void Build()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FindAlbums(Root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Final updateDi2015NewLine        if (Library_Finished != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Library_Finished(this, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void FindAlbums(string root)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Find all the albumsDi2015NewLine        string[] folders = Directory.GetDirectories(root);Di2015NewLine        foreach (string folder in folders)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] files = Directory.GetFiles(folder, "*.mp3");Di2015NewLine            if (files.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Add to library - use first file as being representative of the whole albumDi2015NewLine                var info = new AlbumInfo(files[0]);Di2015NewLine                if (Library_AlbumAdded != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Library_AlbumAdded(this, new AlbumInfoEventArgs(info));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            FindAlbums(folder);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
1684385Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void Library_AlbumAdded(object sender, AlbumInfoEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dataGridView.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dataGridView.Invoke((MethodInvoker)delegate { AddToGrid(e.AlbumInfo); });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AddToGrid(e.AlbumInfo);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Library_Finished(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dataGridView.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dataGridView.Invoke((MethodInvoker)delegate { FinalUpdate(); });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FinalUpdate();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1689607Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class NullSafeExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Tests for null objects without re-computing values or assigning temporary variables.  Similar to Di2015NewLine    /// Groovy's "safe-dereference" operator .? which returns null if the object is null, and de-referencesDi2015NewLine    /// if the object is not null.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TResult">resulting type of the expression</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TCheck">type of object to check for null</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="check">value to check for null</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="valueIfNotNull">delegate to compute if check is not null</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>null if check is null, the delegate's results otherwise</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static TResult NullSafe<TCheck, TResult>(this TCheck check, Func<TCheck, TResult> valueIfNotNull)Di2015NewLine        where TResult : classDi2015NewLine        where TCheck : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return check == null ? null : valueIfNotNull(check);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Tests for null/empty strings without re-computing values or assigning temporary variablesDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TResult">resulting type of the expression</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="check">value to check for null</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="valueIfNotNullOrEmpty">delegate to compute non-null value</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>null if check is null, the delegate's results otherwise</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static TResult CheckNullOrEmpty<TResult>(this string check, Func<string, TResult> valueIfNotNullOrEmpty)Di2015NewLine        where TResult : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.IsNullOrEmpty(check) ? null : valueIfNotNullOrEmpty(check);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Tests for null/empty collections without re-computing values or assigning temporary variablesDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TResult">resulting type of the expression</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TCheck">type of collection or array to check</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="check">value to check for null</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="valueIfNotNullOrEmpty">delegate to compute non-null value</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>null if check is null, the delegate's results otherwise</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static TResult CheckNullOrEmpty<TCheck, TResult>(this TCheck check, Func<TCheck, TResult> valueIfNotNullOrEmpty)Di2015NewLine        where TCheck : ICollectionDi2015NewLine        where TResult : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (check == null || check.Count == 0) ? null : valueIfNotNullOrEmpty(check);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

defaultDi2015NewLine            SetDefaults();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1691638Di2015UniqueSeparator// part of a default abstract setup class I useDi2015NewLinepublic ISessionFactory CreateSessionFactory()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Fluently.Configure()Di2015NewLine        .Database(Di2015NewLine            MsSqlConfiguration.MsSql2008Di2015NewLine                .ConnectionString(c =>Di2015NewLine                    c.Server(this.ServerName)Di2015NewLine                    .Database(this.DatabaseName)Di2015NewLine                    .Username(this.Username)Di2015NewLine                    .Password(this.Password)Di2015NewLine                    )Di2015NewLine        )Di2015NewLine        .Mappings(m =>Di2015NewLine            m.AutoMappings.Add(AutoMap.AssemblyOf<User>()   // loads all POCOseDi2015NewLine                .Where(t => t.Namespace == this.Namespace))Di2015NewLine                // here go the associations and constraints,Di2015NewLine                // (or you can annotate them, or add them later)Di2015NewLine            )Di2015NewLine        .ExposeConfiguration(CreateOrUpdateSchema)Di2015NewLine        .BuildSessionFactory();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// example of an entityDi2015NewLine// It _can_ be as simple as this, which generates the schema, the mappings etsDi2015NewLine// but you still have the flexibility to expand and to map using more complexDi2015NewLine// scenarios. It is not limited to just tables, you can map views, stored proceduresDi2015NewLine// create triggers, associations, unique keys, constraints etc.Di2015NewLine// The Fluent docs help you step by stepDi2015NewLinepublic class UserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public virtual int Id { get; private set; }   // autogens PKDi2015NewLine    public virtual string Name { get; set; }      // augogens Name colDi2015NewLine    public virtual byte[] Picture { get; set; }   // autogens Picture BLOB colDi2015NewLine    public virtual List<UserSettings> Settings { get; set; }  // autogens to many-to-oneDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class UserSettingsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public virtual int Id { get; private set: }   // PK againDi2015NewLine    public virtual int UserId { get; set; }       // autogens FKDi2015NewLine    public virtual User { get; set; }             // autogens OO-mapping to User tableDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1691723Di2015UniqueSeparator// Serialize array - in you case it the stream you read from file.xmlDi2015NewLinevar ints = new[] { 1, 2, 3 };Di2015NewLinevar arraySerializer = new XmlSerializer(typeof(int[]));Di2015NewLinevar memoryStream = new MemoryStream(); // File.OpenWrite("file.xml")Di2015NewLinearraySerializer.Serialize(new StreamWriter(memoryStream), ints);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Save the closing nodeDi2015NewLineint sizeOfClosingNode = 13; // In this case: "</ArrayOfInt>".LengthDi2015NewLine                            // Change the size to fit your arrayDi2015NewLine                            // e.g. ("</ArrayOfOtherType>".Length)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Set the location just before the closing tagDi2015NewLinememoryStream.Position = memoryStream.Length - sizeOfClosingNode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Store the closing tag bytesDi2015NewLinevar buffer = new byte[sizeOfClosingNode];Di2015NewLinememoryStream.Read(buffer, 0, sizeOfClosingNode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Set back to location just before the closing tag.Di2015NewLine// In this location the new item will be written.Di2015NewLinememoryStream.Position = memoryStream.Length - sizeOfClosingNode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Add to serialized array an itemDi2015NewLinevar itemBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine// Write the serialized item as string to itemBuilderDi2015NewLinenew XmlSerializer(typeof(int)).Serialize(new StringWriter(itemBuilder), 4);Di2015NewLine// Get the serialized item XML element (strip the XML document declaration)Di2015NewLineXElement newXmlItem = XElement.Parse(itemBuilder.ToString());Di2015NewLine// Convert the XML to bytes can be written to the fileDi2015NewLinebyte[] bytes = Encoding.Default.GetBytes(newXmlItem.ToString());Di2015NewLine// Write new item to file.Di2015NewLinememoryStream.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine// Write the closing tag.Di2015NewLinememoryStream.Write(buffer, 0, sizeOfClosingNode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Example that it worksDi2015NewLinememoryStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLinevar modifiedArray = (int[]) arraySerializer.Deserialize(memoryStream);Di2015NewLineCollectionAssert.AreEqual(new[] { 1, 2, 3, 4 }, modifiedArray);Di2015NewLine

1692707Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExpressionBuilder {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> ContainsText<T>(string propertyName, string text) {Di2015NewLine    var paramExp = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "type");Di2015NewLine    var propExp = Expression.Property(paramExp, propertyName);Di2015NewLine    var methodInfo = typeof(string).GetMethod("Contains", new[] { typeof(string) });Di2015NewLine    var valueExp = Expression.Constant(text, typeof(string));Di2015NewLine    var methCall = Expression.Call(propExp, methodInfo, valueExp);Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(methCall, paramExp);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1694235Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected byte[] ExtractAudio(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var reader = new BinaryReader(stream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Is stream a Flash Video streamDi2015NewLine        if (reader.ReadChar() != 'F' || reader.ReadChar() != 'L' || reader.ReadChar() != 'V')Di2015NewLine            throw new IOException("The file is not a FLV file.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Is audio stream exists in the video streamDi2015NewLine        var version = reader.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine        var exists = reader.ReadByte();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((exists != 5) && (exists != 4))Di2015NewLine            throw new IOException("No Audio Stream");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        reader.ReadInt32(); // data offset of header. ignoringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var output = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                reader.ReadInt32(); // PreviousTagSize0 skippingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var tagType = reader.ReadByte();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (tagType != 8)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var skip = ReadNext3Bytes(reader) + 11;Di2015NewLine                    reader.BaseStream.Position += skip;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    tagType = reader.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var DataSize = ReadNext3Bytes(reader);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                reader.ReadInt32(); //skip timestamps Di2015NewLine                ReadNext3Bytes(reader); // skip streamIDDi2015NewLine                reader.ReadByte(); // skip audio headerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < DataSize - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine                    output.Add(reader.ReadByte());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return output.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private long ReadNext3Bytes(BinaryReader reader)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Math.Abs((reader.ReadByte() & 0xFF) * 256 * 256 + (reader.ReadByte() & 0xFF)Di2015NewLine                * 256 + (reader.ReadByte() & 0xFF));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1695865Di2015UniqueSeparatorXmlDocument
1695865Di2015UniqueSeparator// create the XmlDocument and add <root> nodeDi2015NewLineXmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLinedoc.AppendChild(doc.CreateElement("root"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// dictionary to keep track of <header> nodesDi2015NewLineDictionary<string, XmlNode> nodesPerColumnA = new Dictionary<string, XmlNode>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Loop through data rowsDi2015NewLineforeach (DataRow row in tbl.Rows)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // extract values for ColumnA and ColumnB as stringsDi2015NewLine   string columnAValue = row["ColumnA"].ToString();Di2015NewLine   string columnBValue = row["ColumnB"].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // create a new <item> XmlNode and fill its attribute @Name Di2015NewLine   XmlElement newNode = doc.CreateElement("item");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   XmlAttribute newNodeAttribute = doc.CreateAttribute("name");Di2015NewLine   newNodeAttribute.InnerText = columnBValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   newNode.Attributes.Append(newNodeAttribute);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // check if we already have a <header> node for that "ColumnA" valueDi2015NewLine   if(nodesPerColumnA.ContainsKey(columnAValue))Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       // if so - just add <item> below that <header>Di2015NewLine       XmlNode parent = nodesPerColumnA[columnAValue];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       parent.AppendChild(newNode);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   elseDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       // if not - create appropriate <header> node and its @name attributeDi2015NewLine       XmlElement header = doc.CreateElement("header");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       XmlAttribute headerAttr = doc.CreateAttribute("name");Di2015NewLine       headerAttr.InnerText = columnAValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       header.Attributes.Append(headerAttr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       header.AppendChild(newNode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       doc.DocumentElement.AppendChild(header);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // store that <header> xmlnode into the dictionary for future useDi2015NewLine       nodesPerColumnA.Add(columnAValue, header);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine // check the contents of the XmlDocument at the endDi2015NewLine string xmlContents = doc.InnerXml;Di2015NewLine

1696274Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable LoadCSV(FileInfo theFile)Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        string sqlString = "Select * FROM [" + theFile.Name + "];";Di2015NewLine        string conStr = "Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Data Source="Di2015NewLine            + theFile.DirectoryName + ";" + "Extended Properties='text;HDR=YES;'";Di2015NewLine        DataTable theCSV = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (OleDbConnection conn = new OleDbConnection(conStr))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (OleDbCommand comm = new OleDbCommand(sqlString, conn))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (OleDbDataAdapter adapter = new OleDbDataAdapter(comm))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    adapter.Fill(theCSV);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return theCSV;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1698845Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class Pool<T> where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly Queue<AsyncResult<T>> asyncQueue = new Queue<AsyncResult<T>>();Di2015NewLine        private readonly Func<T> createFunction;Di2015NewLine        private readonly HashSet<T> pool;Di2015NewLine        private readonly Action<T> resetFunction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Pool(Func<T> createFunction, Action<T> resetFunction, int poolCapacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.createFunction = createFunction;Di2015NewLine            this.resetFunction = resetFunction;Di2015NewLine            pool = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLine            CreatePoolItems(poolCapacity);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Pool(Func<T> createFunction, int poolCapacity) : this(createFunction, null, poolCapacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int CountDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return pool.Count;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void CreatePoolItems(int numItems)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < numItems; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var item = createFunction();Di2015NewLine                pool.Add(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Push(T item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (item == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Push-ing null item. ERROR");Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (resetFunction != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                resetFunction(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            lock (asyncQueue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (asyncQueue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var result = asyncQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                    result.SetAsCompletedAsync(item);Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            lock (pool)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pool.Add(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public T Pop()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T item;Di2015NewLine            lock (pool)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (pool.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return null;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                item = pool.First();Di2015NewLine                pool.Remove(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return item;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IAsyncResult BeginPop(AsyncCallback callback)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var result = new AsyncResult<T>();Di2015NewLine            result.AsyncCallback = callback;Di2015NewLine            lock (pool)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (pool.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    lock (asyncQueue)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        asyncQueue.Enqueue(result);Di2015NewLine                        return result;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                var poppedItem = pool.First();Di2015NewLine                pool.Remove(poppedItem);Di2015NewLine                result.SetAsCompleted(poppedItem);Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public T EndPop(IAsyncResult asyncResult)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var result = (AsyncResult<T>) asyncResult;Di2015NewLine            return result.EndInvoke();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected override int FindCore(PropertyDescriptor prop, object key)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    PropertyInfo propInfo =     TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    PropertyDescriptor prop = properties.Find(property, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (prop == null)Di2015NewLine        return }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineListSortDirection sortDirectionValue;Di2015NewLinePropertyDescriptor sortPropertyValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected override void ApplySortCore(PropertyDescriptor prop,Di2015NewLine    ListSortDirection direction)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    sortedList = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   Type interfaceType = prop.PropertyType.GetInterface("IComparable");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (interfaceType == null && prop.PropertyType.IsValueType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type underlyingType = Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(prop.PropertyType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         if (underlyingType != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            interfaceType = prop;Di2015NewLine        sortDirectionValue = direction;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IEnumerable<T> query = base.Items;Di2015NewLine        if (direction == ListSortDirection.Ascending)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            query = query.OrderBy(i => prop.GetValue(i));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine query)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Items[newIndex] = (T)item;Di2015NewLine            newIndex++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        isSortedValue = true;Di2015NewLine 1705604Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace GuidCollisionDetectorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //var reserveSomeRam = new byte[1024 * 1024 * 100];     // This indeed has no effect.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0:u} - Building a bigHeapOGuids.", DateTime.Now);Di2015NewLine            // Fill up memory with guids.Di2015NewLine            var bigHeapOGuids = new HashSet<Guid>();Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bigHeapOGuids.Add(Guid.NewGuid());Di2015NewLine                } while (true);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (OutOfMemoryException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Release the ram we allocated up front.Di2015NewLine                // Actually, these are pointless too.Di2015NewLine                //GC.KeepAlive(reserveSomeRam);Di2015NewLine                //GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0:u} - Built bigHeapOGuids, contains {1} of them.", DateTime.Now, bigHeapOGuids.LongCount());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Spool up some threads to keep checking if there's a match.Di2015NewLine            // Keep running until the heat death of the universe.Di2015NewLine            for (long k = 0; k < Int64.MaxValue; k++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (long j = 0; j < Int64.MaxValue; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("{0:u} - Looking for collisions with {1} thread(s)....", DateTime.Now, Environment.ProcessorCount);Di2015NewLine                    System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.For(0, Int32.MaxValue, (i) =>Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (bigHeapOGuids.Contains(Guid.NewGuid()))Di2015NewLine                            throw new ApplicationException("Guids collided! Oh my gosh!");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    );Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("{0:u} - That was another {1} attempts without a collision.", DateTime.Now, ((long)Int32.MaxValue) * Environment.ProcessorCount);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Umm... why hasn't the universe ended yet?");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1705710Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void CreateTextFormats(DataObject do) {Di2015NewLine    string textVersion;Di2015NewLine    string htmlVersion;Di2015NewLine    // Do the work of making the tab-separated text version and the HTML codeDi2015NewLine    do.SetData(textVersion);Di2015NewLine    do.SetText(ConvertToHtmlFragment(htmlVersion), TextDataFormat.Html);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1705710Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Convert the fragment of HTML into the Clipboards HTML format.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <remarks>The HTML format is found here http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa767917.aspxDi2015NewLine/// </remarks>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="fragment">The HTML to put onto the clipboard. It must be valid HTML!</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A string that can be put onto the clipboard and will be recognized as HTML</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate string ConvertToHtmlFragment(string fragment) {Di2015NewLine    // Minimal implementation of HTML clipboard formatDi2015NewLine    string source = "http://www.codeproject.com/KB/list/ObjectListView.aspx";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const String MARKER_BLOCK =Di2015NewLine        "Version:1.0\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine        "StartHTML:{0,8}\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine        "EndHTML:{1,8}\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine        "StartFragment:{2,8}\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine        "EndFragment:{3,8}\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine        "StartSelection:{2,8}\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine        "EndSelection:{3,8}\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine        "SourceURL:{4}\\r\\n" +Di2015NewLine        "{5}";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int prefixLength = String.Format(MARKER_BLOCK, 0, 0, 0, 0, source, "").Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const String DEFAULT_HTML_BODY =Di2015NewLine        "<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC \\"-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN\\">" +Di2015NewLine        "<HTML><HEAD></HEAD><BODY><!--StartFragment-->{0}<!--EndFragment--></BODY></HTML>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string html = String.Format(DEFAULT_HTML_BODY, fragment);Di2015NewLine    int startFragment = prefixLength + html.IndexOf(fragment);Di2015NewLine    int endFragment = startFragment + fragment.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return String.Format(MARKER_BLOCK, prefixLength, prefixLength + html.Length, startFragment, endFragment, source, html);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1708536Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Button _previousButton;Di2015NewLineprivate void listBox_SelectionChanged(object sender, SelectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine if (_previousButton != null)Di2015NewLine  _previousButton.Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine // Make sure an item is selectedDi2015NewLine if (listBox.SelectedItems.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine  return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine // Get the first SelectedItem (use a List<object> when Di2015NewLine // the SelectionMode is set to Multiple)Di2015NewLine object selectedItem = listBox.SelectedItems[0];Di2015NewLine // Get the ListBoxItem from the ContainerGeneratorDi2015NewLine ListBoxItem listBoxItem = listBox.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem(selectedItem) as ListBoxItem;Di2015NewLine if (listBoxItem == null)Di2015NewLine  return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine // Find a button in the WPF TreeDi2015NewLine Button button = FindDescendant<Button>(listBoxItem);Di2015NewLine if (button == null)Di2015NewLine  return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine button.Visibility = Visibility.Visible;Di2015NewLine _previousButton = button;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Finds the descendant of a dependency object.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T"></typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="obj">The obj.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static T FindDescendant<T>(DependencyObject obj) where T : DependencyObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine // Check if this object is the specified typeDi2015NewLine if (obj is T)Di2015NewLine  return obj as T;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine // Check for childrenDi2015NewLine int childrenCount = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(obj);Di2015NewLine if (childrenCount < 1)Di2015NewLine  return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine // First check all the childrenDi2015NewLine for (int i = 0; i < childrenCount; i++)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine  DependencyObject child = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(obj, i);Di2015NewLine  if (child is T)Di2015NewLine   return child as T;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine // Then check the childrens childrenDi2015NewLine for (int i = 0; i < childrenCount; i++)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine  DependencyObject child = FindDescendant<T>(VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(obj, i));Di2015NewLine  if (child != null && child is T)Di2015NewLine   return child as T;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1708614Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Response DeserializeAndValidate(string tempFileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    XmlSchemaSet schemas = new XmlSchemaSet();Di2015NewLine    schemas.Add(LoadSchema());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Exception firstException = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var settings = new XmlReaderSettingsDi2015NewLine                   {Di2015NewLine                       Schemas = schemas,Di2015NewLine                       ValidationType = ValidationType.Schema,Di2015NewLine                       ValidationFlags =Di2015NewLine                           XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessIdentityConstraints |Di2015NewLine                           XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ReportValidationWarningsDi2015NewLine                   };Di2015NewLine    settings.ValidationEventHandler +=Di2015NewLine        delegate(object sender, ValidationEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (args.Severity == XmlSeverityType.Warning)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(args.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (firstException == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    firstException = args.Exception;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(args.Exception.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Response result;Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    PropertyChangedCallback = (obj, e) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if(e.OldValue!=null) BindingOperations.ClearBinding(obj, Grid.RowProperty);Di2015NewLine      if(e.NewValue!=null) BindingOperations.SetBinding(obj, Grid.RowProperty, _rowBinding);Di2015NewLine    },Di2015NewLine  });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Construct bindings for Grid.Column and BuildBinding(grid => grid.RowDefinitions, RowProperty);Di2015NewLine  private static BindingBase BuildBinding(Func<Grid, IList> getDefinitions, DependencyProperty nameProperty)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var binding = new MultiBindingDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Converter = new NameLookupConverter { GetDefinitions = getDefinitions }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    binding.Bindings.Add(new Binding { Path = new PropertyPath(nameProperty), RelativeSource = RelativeSource.Self });Di2015NewLine    binding.Bindings.Add(new Binding { RelativeSource = new RelativeSource(RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor, typeof(Grid), 1) });Di2015NewLine    return binding;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Converter to take a row/column name and a Grid, and find the index of that row/column in the gridDi2015NewLine  private class NameLookupConverter : IMultiValueConverterDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public Func<Grid, IList> GetDefinitions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object Convert(object[] values, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var name = values[0] as string;Di2015NewLine      var grid = values[1] as Grid;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      if(grid==null || name==null) return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      object namedObject = grid.FindName(name);Di2015NewLine      if(namedObject==null) return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      int index = GetDefinitions(grid).IndexOf(namedObject);Di2015NewLine      return index<0 ? 0 : index;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object[] ConvertBack(object value, Type[] targetTypes, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1720642Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class GrandParentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Parent Parent { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class ParentDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Child Child { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Method(string s) { return s + "abc"; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ChildDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static class ExpressionUtilsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T1, T3>> Combine<T1, T2, T3>(Di2015NewLine        this Expression<Func<T1, T2>> outer, Expression<Func<T2, T3>> inner, bool inline)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var invoke = Expression.Invoke(inner, outer.Body);Di2015NewLine        Expression body = inline ? new ExpressionRewriter().AutoInline(invoke) : invoke;Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<T1, T3>>(body, outer.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class ExpressionRewriterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal Expression AutoInline(InvocationExpression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        isLocked = true;Di2015NewLine        if(expression == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("expression");Di2015NewLine        LambdaExpression lambda = (LambdaExpression)expression.Expression;Di2015NewLine        ExpressionRewriter childScope = new ExpressionRewriter(this);Di2015NewLine        var lambdaParams = lambda.Parameters;Di2015NewLine        var invokeArgs = expression.Arguments;Di2015NewLine        if (lambdaParams.Count != invokeArgs.Count) throw new InvalidOperationException("Lambda/invoke mismatch");Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 0 ; i < lambdaParams.Count; i++) {Di2015NewLine            childScope.Subst(lambdaParams[i], invokeArgs[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return childScope.Apply(lambda.Body);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public ExpressionRewriter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         subst = new Dictionary<Expression, Expression>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private ExpressionRewriter(ExpressionRewriter parent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (parent == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("parent");Di2015NewLine        subst = new Dictionary<Expression, Expression>(parent.subst);Di2015NewLine        inline = parent.inline;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private bool isLocked, inline;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<Expression, Expression> subst;Di2015NewLine    private void CheckLocked() {Di2015NewLine        if(isLocked) throw new InvalidOperationException(Di2015NewLine            "You cannot alter the rewriter after Apply has been called");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public ExpressionRewriter Subst(Expression from,Di2015NewLine        Expression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CheckLocked();Di2015NewLine        subst.Add(from, to);Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public ExpressionRewriter Inline() {Di2015NewLine        CheckLocked();Di2015NewLine        inline = true;Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public Expression Apply(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        isLocked = true;Di2015NewLine        return Walk(expression) ?? expression;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<Expression> CoalesceTerms(Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<Expression> sourceWithNulls, IEnumerable<Expression> replacements)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(sourceWithNulls != null && replacements != null) {Di2015NewLine            using(var left = sourceWithNulls.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine            using (var right = replacements.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (left.MoveNext() && right.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return left.Current ?? right.Current;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private Expression[] Walk(IEnumerable<Expression> expressions) {Di2015NewLine        if(expressions == null) return null;Di2015NewLine        return expressions.Select(expr => Walk(expr)).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static bool HasValue(Expression[] expressions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return expressions != null && expressions.Any(expr => expr != null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // returns null if no need to rewrite that branch, otherwiseDi2015NewLine    // returns a re-written branchDi2015NewLine    private Expression Walk(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (expression == null) return null;Di2015NewLine        Expression tmp;Di2015NewLine        if (subst.TryGetValue(expression, out tmp)) return tmp;Di2015NewLine        switch(expression.NodeType) {Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Constant:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Parameter:Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return expression; // never a need to rewrite if not already matchedDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.MemberAccess:Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    MemberExpression me = (MemberExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine                    Expression target = Walk(me.Expression);Di2015NewLine                    return target == null ? null : Expression.MakeMemberAccess(target, me.Member);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Add:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Divide:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Multiply:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Subtract:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.AddChecked:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.MultiplyChecked:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.SubtractChecked:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.And:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Or:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.ExclusiveOr:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Equal:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.NotEqual:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.AndAlso:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.OrElse:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Power:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Modulo:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.GreaterThan:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.GreaterThanOrEqual:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.LessThan:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.LessThanOrEqual:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.LeftShift:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.RightShift:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Coalesce:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.ArrayIndex:Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    BinaryExpression binExp = (BinaryExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine                    Expression left = Walk(binExp.Left), right = Walk(binExp.Right);Di2015NewLine                    return (left == null && right == null) ? null : Expression.MakeBinary(Di2015NewLine                        binExp.NodeType, left ?? binExp.Left, right ?? binExp.Right, binExp.IsLiftedToNull,Di2015NewLine                        binExp.Method, binExp.Conversion);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Not:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.UnaryPlus:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Negate:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.NegateChecked:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Convert: Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.ConvertChecked:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.TypeAs:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.ArrayLength:Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    UnaryExpression unExp = (UnaryExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine                    Expression operand = Walk(unExp.Operand);Di2015NewLine                    return operand == null ? null : Expression.MakeUnary(unExp.NodeType, operand,Di2015NewLine                        unExp.Type, unExp.Method);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Conditional:Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ConditionalExpression ce = (ConditionalExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine                    Expression test = Walk(ce.Test), ifTrue = Walk(ce.IfTrue), ifFalse = Walk(ce.IfFalse);Di2015NewLine                    if (test == null && ifTrue == null && ifFalse == null) return null;Di2015NewLine                    return Expression.Condition(test ?? ce.Test, ifTrue ?? ce.IfTrue, ifFalse ?? ce.IfFalse);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Call:Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    MethodCallExpression mce = (MethodCallExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine                    Expression instance = Walk(mce.Object);Di2015NewLine                    Expression[] args = Walk(mce.Arguments);Di2015NewLine                    if (instance == null && !HasValue(args)) return null;Di2015NewLine                    return Expression.Call(instance, mce.Method, CoalesceTerms(args, mce.Arguments));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.TypeIs:Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    TypeBinaryExpression tbe = (TypeBinaryExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine                    tmp = Walk(tbe.Expression);Di2015NewLine                    return tmp == null ? null : Expression.TypeIs(tmp, tbe.TypeOperand);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.New:Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    NewExpression ne = (NewExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine                    Expression[] args = Walk(ne.Arguments);Di2015NewLine                    if (HasValue(args)) return null;Di2015NewLine                    return ne.Members == null ? Expression.New(ne.Constructor, CoalesceTerms(args, ne.Arguments))Di2015NewLine                        : Expression.New(ne.Constructor, CoalesceTerms(args, ne.Arguments), ne.Members);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.ListInit:Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ListInitExpression lie = (ListInitExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine                    NewExpression ctor = (NewExpression)Walk(lie.NewExpression);Di2015NewLine                    var inits = lie.Initializers.Select(init => newDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Original = init,Di2015NewLine                        NewArgs = Walk(init.Arguments)Di2015NewLine                    }).ToArray();Di2015NewLine                    if (ctor == null && !inits.Any(init => HasValue(init.NewArgs))) return null;Di2015NewLine                    ElementInit[] initArr = inits.Select(init => Expression.ElementInit(Di2015NewLine                            init.Original.AddMethod, CoalesceTerms(init.NewArgs, init.Original.Arguments))).ToArray();Di2015NewLine                    return Expression.ListInit(ctor ?? lie.NewExpression, initArr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.NewArrayBounds:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.NewArrayInit:Di2015NewLine                /* not quite right... leave as not-implemented for nowDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    NewArrayExpression nae = (NewArrayExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine                    Expression[] expr = Walk(nae.Expressions);Di2015NewLine                    if (!HasValue(expr)) return null;Di2015NewLine                    return expression.NodeType == ExpressionType.NewArrayBoundsDi2015NewLine                        ? Expression.NewArrayBounds(nae.Type, CoalesceTerms(expr, nae.Expressions))Di2015NewLine                        : Expression.NewArrayInit(nae.Type, CoalesceTerms(expr, nae.Expressions));Di2015NewLine                }*/Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Invoke:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Lambda:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.MemberInit:Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Quote:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotImplementedException("Not implemented: " + expression.NodeType);Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotSupportedException("Not supported: " + expression.NodeType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<GrandParent, Parent>> myFirst = gp => gp.Parent;Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<Parent, string>> mySecond = p => p.Child.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Expression<Func<GrandParent, string>> outputWithInline = myFirst.Combine(mySecond, false);Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<GrandParent, string>> outputWithoutInline = myFirst.Combine(mySecond, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Expression<Func<GrandParent, string>> call =Di2015NewLine                ExpressionUtils.Combine<GrandParent, Parent, string>(Di2015NewLine                gp => gp.Parent, p => p.Method(p.Child.Name), true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        uncheckedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Expression<Func<double, double>> mathUnchecked =Di2015NewLine                ExpressionUtils.Combine<double, double, double>(x => (x * x) + x, x => x - (x / x), true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        checkedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Expression<Func<double, double>> mathChecked =Di2015NewLine                ExpressionUtils.Combine<double, double, double>(x => x - (x * x) , x => (x / x) + x, true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<int,int>> bitwise =Di2015NewLine            ExpressionUtils.Combine<int, int, int>(x => (x & 0x01) | 0x03, x => x ^ 0xFF, true);Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<int, bool>> logical =Di2015NewLine            ExpressionUtils.Combine<int, bool, bool>(x => x == 123, x => x != false, true);Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<int[][], int>> arrayAccess =Di2015NewLine            ExpressionUtils.Combine<int[][], int[], int>(x => x[0], x => x[0], true);Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<string, bool>> isTest =Di2015NewLine            ExpressionUtils.Combine<string,object,bool>(s=>s, s=> s is Regex, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Expression<Func<List<int>>> f = () => new List<int>(new int[] { 1, 1, 1 }.Length);Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<string, Regex>> asTest =Di2015NewLine            ExpressionUtils.Combine<string, object, Regex>(s => s, s => s as Regex, true);Di2015NewLine        var initTest = ExpressionUtils.Combine<int, int[], List<int>>(i => new[] {i,i,i}, Di2015NewLine                    arr => new List<int>(arr.Length), true);Di2015NewLine        var anonAndListTest = ExpressionUtils.Combine<int, int, List<int>>(Di2015NewLine                i => new { age = i }.age, i => new List<int> {i, i}, true);Di2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine        var arrBoundsInit = ExpressionUtils.Combine<int, int[], int[]>(Di2015NewLine            i => new int[i], arr => new int[arr[0]] , true);Di2015NewLine        var arrInit = ExpressionUtils.Combine<int, int, int[]>(Di2015NewLine            i => i, i => new int[1] { i }, true);*/Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1721820Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class StringDistanceUtil {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///   Returns the longest common substring of the given two arguments.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="first">Di2015NewLine    ///   the first stringDi2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="second">Di2015NewLine    ///   the second stringDi2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    ///   the longest common substring of the given two argumentsDi2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string LongestCommonSubstringWith(this string first, string second) {Di2015NewLine        // could have used dynamic programming, or generalized suffix treeDi2015NewLine        // to solve the LCS problem, but here we'll just stick to simplicityDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var start = 0; // The start in a of the longest found so farDi2015NewLine        var len = 0;   // The length of the longest found so farDi2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < first.Length - len; ++i) {Di2015NewLine            for (var j = first.Length - i; j > len; --j) {Di2015NewLine                if (second.Contains(first.Substring(i, j))) {Di2015NewLine                    start = i;Di2015NewLine                    len = j;Di2015NewLine                    break; // Exit the inner loopDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return first.Substring(start, len);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///   Returns the distance of two strings.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="str">Di2015NewLine    ///   a stringDi2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="target">Di2015NewLine    ///   the target stringDi2015NewLine    /// </param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    ///   the distance from a string to the target stringDi2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    public static double DistanceFrom(this string str, string target) {Di2015NewLine        var strLen = str.Length;Di2015NewLine        var targetLen = target.Length;Di2015NewLine        var ratio = str.LongestCommonSubstringWith(target).LengthDi2015NewLine                / (double) targetLen;Di2015NewLine        var penalty =Di2015NewLine            (strLen > targetLen) ?Di2015NewLine                (0.1 * (strLen - targetLen))Di2015NewLine                : 0;Di2015NewLine        return ratio - penalty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        var list = new List<string> {Di2015NewLine            "zero",Di2015NewLine            "range",Di2015NewLine            "shot",Di2015NewLine            "shoot",Di2015NewLine            "hop",Di2015NewLine            "rage",Di2015NewLine            "fang",Di2015NewLine            "age"Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        var target = "zero_range_shot";Di2015NewLine        var top5mostRelated = listDi2015NewLine            .OrderByDescending(str => str.ToUpper().DistanceFrom(target.ToUpper()))Di2015NewLine            .Take(5).ToList();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var str in top5mostRelated) Console.WriteLine(str);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1726944Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ThreadPoolWait : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int _remainingWorkItems = 1;Di2015NewLine    private ManualResetEvent _done = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void QueueUserWorkItem(WaitCallback callback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        QueueUserWorkItem(callback, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void QueueUserWorkItem(WaitCallback callback, object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ThrowIfDisposed();Di2015NewLine        QueuedCallback qc = new QueuedCallback();Di2015NewLine        qc.Callback = callback;Di2015NewLine        qc.State = state;Di2015NewLine        lock (_done) _remainingWorkItems++;Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(new WaitCallback(HandleWorkItem), qc);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool WaitOne() { return WaitOne(-1, false); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool WaitOne(TimeSpan timeout, bool exitContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return WaitOne((int)timeout.TotalMilliseconds, exitContext);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool WaitOne(int millisecondsTimeout, bool exitContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ThrowIfDisposed();Di2015NewLine        DoneWorkItem();Di2015NewLine        bool rv = _done.WaitOne(millisecondsTimeout, exitContext);Di2015NewLine        lock (_done)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (rv)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _remainingWorkItems = 1;Di2015NewLine                _done.Reset();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else _remainingWorkItems++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return rv;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void HandleWorkItem(object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        QueuedCallback qc = (QueuedCallback)state;Di2015NewLine        try { qc.Callback(qc.State); }Di2015NewLine        finally { DoneWorkItem(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void DoneWorkItem()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_done)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            --_remainingWorkItems;Di2015NewLine            if (_remainingWorkItems == 0) _done.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class QueuedCallbackDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public WaitCallback Callback;Di2015NewLine        public object State;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ThrowIfDisposed()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_done == null) throw new ObjectDisposedException(GetType().Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_done != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ((IDisposable)_done).Dispose();Di2015NewLine            _done = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1729444Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool Intersects<T>(this Range<T> first, Range<T> second, IComparer<T> comparer)Di2015NewLine        {    Di2015NewLine            return (ReferenceEquals(first.Start, null) || ReferenceEquals(second.End, null) || comparer.Compare(first.Start, second.End) <= 0)Di2015NewLine                && (ReferenceEquals(first.End, null) || ReferenceEquals(second.Start, null) || comparer.Compare(first.End, second.Start) >= 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
1729444Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Range<T> GetIntersectionWith<T>(this Range<T> first, Range<T> second, IComparer<T> comparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Return null, if any range is null or if they don't  intersect at allDi2015NewLine        if (first == null || second == null || !Intersects(first, second, comparer))Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        T start;Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(first.Start, null))Di2015NewLine            start = second.Start;Di2015NewLine        else if (ReferenceEquals(second.Start, null))Di2015NewLine            start = first.Start;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            start = comparer.Compare(first.Start, second.Start) < 0 Di2015NewLine                        ? second.Start Di2015NewLine                        : first.Start;        Di2015NewLine        T end;Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(first.End, null))Di2015NewLine            end = second.End;Di2015NewLine        else if (ReferenceEquals(second.End, null))Di2015NewLine            end = first.End;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            end = comparer.Compare(first.End, second.End) > 0 Di2015NewLine                        ? second.End Di2015NewLine                        : first.End;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Range.Create(start, end);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1734075Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace HasherDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  class ProgramDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      const string PrivateKey = "whatever";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      string date = "Sat, 14 Nov 2009 09:47:53 GMT";Di2015NewLine      string token = string.Format("-{0}-GET-/video.xml-", date);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      byte[] salt_binary = SHA1.Create().ComputeHash(Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(token));Di2015NewLine      string salt_hex = BitConverter.ToString(salt_binary).Replace("-", "").ToLower();Di2015NewLine      string salt = salt_hex.Substring(0, 20);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      HMACSHA1 hmac_sha1 = new HMACSHA1(Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(PrivateKey));Di2015NewLine      hmac_sha1.Initialize();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      byte[] private_key_binary = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(salt);Di2015NewLine      byte[] passkey_binary = hmac_sha1.ComputeHash(private_key_binary, 0, private_key_binary.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      string passkey = Convert.ToBase64String(passkey_binary).Trim();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1739586Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Deserialize(string input, List<string[]> values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MatchCollection matches = Regex.Matches(input, pattern, RegexOptions.SingleLine | RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine    foreach(Match match in matches)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(match.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(match.Groups["nested"].Success && !string.IsNullOrEmpty(match.Groups["nested"].Value))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Deserialize(match.Groups["nested"].Value, values);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                values.Add(new string[] {Di2015NewLine                    match.Groups["key"].Value,Di2015NewLine                    match.Groups["simple"].ValueDi2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1741623Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DriverDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Purpose: directs the program in what to do and loops the program while np.again != nDi2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //No need to split this into two strings just to concatenate them together immediatelyDi2015NewLine        string pathName = "empdata.txt";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Use a list instead of an array to allow for a variable amount of employeesDi2015NewLine            List<Employee> employees = new List<Employee>();Di2015NewLine            TextReader tr = new StreamReader(pathName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //This while statement is a common pattern for reading data from a stream.Di2015NewLine            //Reademployee was changed to return null when no more employees are present.Di2015NewLine            Employee employee;Di2015NewLine            while ((employee = Employee.Read(tr)) != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                employees.Add(employee);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        } while (again() != 'n');Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Make the method static if it doesn't have any relation to any specific objectDi2015NewLine    // Purpose: asks the user if they want to run the program againDi2015NewLine    // Returns: a char ( y or n )Di2015NewLine    public static char again()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char response = ' ';Di2015NewLine        while (response != 'y' && response != 'n')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("\\nWould you like run again? (y or n)");Di2015NewLine            response = char.Parse(Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine            response = char.ToLower(response);Di2015NewLine            Console.Clear();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return response;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass EmployeeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //This is a nice syntax if using c# 3.5. It allows for simple properties with minimal code.Di2015NewLine    public int EmployeeNumber { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string FirstName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string LastName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Adress { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public double HourlyWage { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int HoursWorked { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Employee()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Avoid code duplication by calling the reset methodDi2015NewLine        Reset();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Reset()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EmployeeNumber = 0;Di2015NewLine        FirstName = "";Di2015NewLine        LastName = "";Di2015NewLine        Adress = "";Di2015NewLine        HourlyWage = 0;Di2015NewLine        HoursWorked = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //This method fits better directly inside the employee classDi2015NewLine    public static Employee Read(TextReader tr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Employee employee = new Employee();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string line = tr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        //We exit as soon as we detect that the file has ended.Di2015NewLine        //This makes the code cleaner than having nested if-else.Di2015NewLine        //(I personally don't use the {} on single lines, but many do.Di2015NewLine        if (line == null) {return null;} //No more postsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //The whole do-while loop was removed. Unnescessary while loops should alwaysDi2015NewLine        //be avoided as they are one of the most difficult code constructs to follow,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        employee.EmployeeNumber = int.Parse(line);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Your helpmethod just complicated things. It also contained an unnesscesary loopDi2015NewLine        string[] splitName = tr.ReadLine().Split(' ');Di2015NewLine        employee.FirstName = splitName[0];Di2015NewLine        employee.LastName = splitName[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        employee.Adress = tr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Same as above. Also, changed HoursWorked to integer.Di2015NewLine        string[] splitHours = tr.ReadLine().Split(' ');Di2015NewLine        //InvariantCulture should always be used when dealing with data of a well defined format.Di2015NewLine        //Otherwise the code won't work on computers with different culture settings.Di2015NewLine        //(Like ones that use "," instead of ".")Di2015NewLine        employee.HourlyWage = double.Parse(splitHours[0], System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine        employee.HoursWorked = int.Parse(splitHours[1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return employee;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Print()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("-------------------------------------");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(this.ToString());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("-------------------------------------");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Text.StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendFormat("Employee Number: --- {0}", EmployeeNumber);Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendFormat("           Name: --- {0}, {1}", LastName, FirstName);Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendFormat("         Adress: --- {0}", Adress);Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendFormat("    Hourly wage: --- {0:f2} (USD per hour)", HourlyWage);Di2015NewLine        if (HoursWorked == 1)Di2015NewLine            sb.AppendFormat("   Hours Worked: --- 1hr ");Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            sb.AppendFormat("   Hours Worked: --- {0:f2}hrs", HoursWorked);Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1742745Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Sub ReplaceInProject(ByVal oDocument As Document, ByVal strMethodName As String, ByVal strFindText As String, ByVal strReplaceWithText As String)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' For each module (of any type - could use oVbComponent.Type to restrictDi2015NewLine    ' this to certain types of module)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim oVbComponent As VBComponentDi2015NewLine    For Each oVbComponent In oDocument.VBProject.VBComponentsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Dim oCodeModule As CodeModuleDi2015NewLine        Set oCodeModule = oVbComponent.CodeModuleDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ' See if we can find the method in this moduleDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Dim ixStartLine As LongDi2015NewLine        ixStartLine = FindMethodStartLine(oCodeModule, strMethodName)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        If ixStartLine > 0 ThenDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ' Get all the text of the methodDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Dim numLines As LongDi2015NewLine            numLines = oCodeModule.ProcCountLines(strMethodName, vbext_pk_Proc)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Dim strLines As StringDi2015NewLine            strLines = oCodeModule.Lines(ixStartLine, numLines)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ' Do the find/replaceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            strLines = Replace(strLines, strFindText, strReplaceWithText)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ' Replace the method text.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            oCodeModule.DeleteLines ixStartLine, numLinesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            oCodeModule.InsertLines ixStartLine, strLinesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Next oVbComponentDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePrivate Function FindMethodStartLine(ByVal oCodeModule As CodeModule, ByVal strMethodName As String) As LongDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    FindMethodStartLine = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' ProcStartLine will raise an error if the method is not found;Di2015NewLine    ' we'll just ignore the error and return -1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    On Error Resume NextDi2015NewLine    FindMethodStartLine = oCodeModule.ProcStartLine(strMethodName, vbext_pk_Proc)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

i < bytes.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Display the physical address in hexadecimal.Di2015NewLine                    Console.Write("{0}", bytes[i].ToString("X2"));Di2015NewLine                    // Insert a hyphen after each byte, unless we are at the end of theDi2015NewLine                    // address.Di2015NewLine                    if (i != bytes.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write("-");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ShowNetworkInterfaces();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1746991Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //In this case, this delegate declaration is like specifying a specific kind of function that must be used with events.Di2015NewLine    public delegate string CallbackDemo(string str);Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static event CallbackDemo OnFoobared;Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //this means that StrAnother is "subscribing" to the event, in other words it gets called when the event is firedDi2015NewLine            OnFoobared += StrAnother;Di2015NewLine            string substr = Strfunc();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(substr);Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine            //this is the other use of delegates, in this case they are being used as an "anonymous function". Di2015NewLine            //This one takes no parameters and returns void, and it's equivalent to the function declaration Di2015NewLine            //'void myMethod() { Console.WriteLine("another use of a delegate"); }'Di2015NewLine            Action myCode = delegateDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("another use of a delegate");Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            myCode();Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine            //the previous 4 lines are equivalent to the following however this is generally what you should use if you canDi2015NewLine            //its called a lambda expression but it's basically a way to toss arbitrary code aroundDi2015NewLine            //read more at http://www.developer.com/net/csharp/article.php/3598381/The-New-Lambda-Expressions-Feature-in-C-30.htm or Di2015NewLine            //http://stackoverflow.com/questions/167343/c-lambda-expression-why-should-i-use-thisDi2015NewLine            Action myCode2 = () => Console.WriteLine("a lambda expression");Di2015NewLine            myCode2();Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static string Strfunc()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return OnFoobared("a use of a delegate (with an event)");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        static string StrAnother(string str)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return str.Substring(1, 3).ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1751751Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic boolDi2015NewLine   Ping (string host, int attempts, int timeout)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping  ping = Di2015NewLine                                       new System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply  pingReply;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      for (int i = 0; i < attempts; i++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         tryDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            pingReply = ping.Send (host, timeout); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If there is a successful ping then return true.Di2015NewLine            if (pingReply != null &&Di2015NewLine                pingReply.Status == System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.Success)Di2015NewLine               return true;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         catchDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            // Do nothing and let it try again until the attempts are exausted.Di2015NewLine            // Exceptions are thrown for normal ping failurs like address lookupDi2015NewLine            // failed.  For this reason we are supressing errors.Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Return false if we can't successfully ping the server after several attempts.Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine

1752863Di2015UniqueSeparator public static string ActionLinkWithList( this HtmlHelper helper, string text, string action, string controller, object routeData, object htmlAttributes )Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine     var urlHelper = new UrlHelper( helper.ViewContext.RequestContext );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     string href = urlHelper.Action( action, controller );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     if (routeData != null)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         RouteValueDictionary rv = new RouteValueDictionary( routeData );Di2015NewLine         List<string> urlParameters = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine         foreach (var key in rv.Keys)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             object value = rv[key];Di2015NewLine             if (value is IEnumerable && !(value is string))Di2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                 int i = 0;Di2015NewLine                 foreach (object val in (IEnumerable)value)Di2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                     urlParameters.Add( string.Format( "{0}[{2}]={1}", key, val, i ));Di2015NewLine                     ++i;Di2015NewLine                 }Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine             else if (value != null)Di2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                 urlParameters.Add( string.Format( "{0}={1}", key, value ) );Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         string paramString = string.Join( "&", urlParameters.ToArray() ); // ToArray not needed in 4.0Di2015NewLine         if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty( paramString ))Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            href += "?" + paramString;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     TagBuilder builder = new TagBuilder( "a" );Di2015NewLine     builder.Attributes.Add("href",href);Di2015NewLine     builder.MergeAttributes( new RouteValueDictionary( htmlAttributes ) );Di2015NewLine     builder.SetInnerText( text );Di2015NewLine     return builder.ToString( TagRenderMode.Normal );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1757511Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool DoSearch(RichTextBox richTextBox, string searchText, bool searchNext)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  TextRange searchRange;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Get the range to searchDi2015NewLine  if(searchNext)Di2015NewLine    searchRange = new TextRange(Di2015NewLine        richTextBox.Selection.Start.GetPositionAtOffset(1),Di2015NewLine        richTextBox.Document.ContentEnd);Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine    searchRange = new TextRange(Di2015NewLine        richTextBox.Document.ContentStart,Di2015NewLine        richTextBox.Document.ContentEnd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Do the searchDi2015NewLine  TextRange foundRange = FindTextInRange(searchRange, searchText);Di2015NewLine  if(foundRange==null)Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Select the found rangeDi2015NewLine  richTextBox.Selection.Select(foundRange.Start, foundRange.End);Di2015NewLine  return true; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic TextRange FindTextInRange(TextRange searchRange, string searchText)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Search the text with IndexOfDi2015NewLine  int offset = searchRange.Text.IndexOf(searchText);Di2015NewLine  if(offset<0)Di2015NewLine    return null;  // Not foundDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Try to select the text as a contiguous rangeDi2015NewLine  for(TextPointer start = searchRange.Start.GetPositionAtOffset(offset); start != searchRange.End; start = start.GetPositionAtOffset(1))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    TextRange result = new TextRange(start, start.GetPositionAtOffset(searchText.Length);Di2015NewLine    if(result.Text == searchText)Di2015NewLine      return result;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
