1758451Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> InterleaveWith<T>Di2015NewLine   (this IEnumerable<T> first, IEnumerable<T> second,Di2015NewLine    int firstGrouping, int secondGrouping)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<T> firstIterator = first.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<T> secondIterator = second.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool exhaustedFirst = false;Di2015NewLine        // Keep going while we've got elements in the first sequence.Di2015NewLine        while (!exhaustedFirst)Di2015NewLine        {                Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < firstGrouping; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                 if (!firstIterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                     exhaustedFirst = true;Di2015NewLine                     break;Di2015NewLine                 }Di2015NewLine                 yield return firstIterator.Current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // This may not yield any results - the first sequenceDi2015NewLine            // could go on for much longer than the second. It does noDi2015NewLine            // harm though; we can keep calling MoveNext() as oftenDi2015NewLine            // as we want.Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < secondGrouping; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                 // This is a bit ugly, but it works...Di2015NewLine                 if (!secondIterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                     break;Di2015NewLine                 }Di2015NewLine                 yield return secondIterator.Current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // We may have elements in the second sequence left over.Di2015NewLine        // Yield them all now.Di2015NewLine        while (secondIterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return secondIterator.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1759177Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class StringExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Parse the <paramref name="target"/> as a <typeparamref name="T"/>. If this cannot be achieved, return the default value of <typeparamref name="T"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The type to parse into.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="target">The string to parse.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The resultant <typeparamref name="T"/> or the default of <typeparamref name="T"/>.</returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <example>Di2015NewLine    /// <code>Di2015NewLine    /// "1234".Parse&ltint>() == 1234;Di2015NewLine    /// "a".Parse&ltint>() == 0;Di2015NewLine    /// "a".Parse&ltint?>() == null;Di2015NewLine    /// "2010-01-01".Parse<DateTime?>() == new DateTime(2010, 1, 1)Di2015NewLine    /// "2010-01-01a".Parse<DateTime?>() == nullDi2015NewLine    /// "127.0.0.1".Parse<System.Net.IPAddress>().Equals(new System.Net.IPAddress(new byte[] { 127, 0, 0, 1 }))Di2015NewLine    /// "".Parse<System.Net.IPAddress>() == nullDi2015NewLine    /// </code>Di2015NewLine    /// </example>Di2015NewLine    public static T Parse<T>(this string target)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ParseHelper<T>.Parse(target);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Parse the <paramref name="target"/> as a <typeparamref name="T"/>. If this cannot be achieved, return <paramref name="defaultValue"/>Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The type to parse into.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="target">The string to parse.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="defaultValue">The value to return if <paramref name="target"/> could not be parsed.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The resultant <typeparamref name="T"/> or <paramref name="defaultValue"/>.</returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <example>Di2015NewLine    /// <code>Di2015NewLine    /// "1234".Parse&ltint>(-1) == 1234;Di2015NewLine    /// "a".Parse&ltint>(-1) == -1;Di2015NewLine    /// "2010-01-01".Parse<DateTime?>(new DateTime(1900, 1, 1)) == new DateTime(2010, 1, 1)Di2015NewLine    /// "2010-01-01a".Parse<DateTime?>(new DateTime(1900, 1, 1)) == new DateTime(1900, 1, 1)Di2015NewLine    /// "127.0.0.1".Parse<System.Net.IPAddress>(new System.Net.IPAddress(new byte[] { 0, 0, 0, 0 })).Equals(new System.Net.IPAddress(new byte[] { 127, 0, 0, 1 }))Di2015NewLine    /// "".Parse<System.Net.IPAddress>(new System.Net.IPAddress(new byte[] { 0, 0, 0, 0 })).Equals(new System.Net.IPAddress(new byte[] { 0, 0, 0, 0 }))Di2015NewLine    /// </code>Di2015NewLine    /// </example>Di2015NewLine    public static T Parse<T>(this string target, T defaultValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ParseHelper<T>.Parse(target, defaultValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static class ParseHelper<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static readonly Func<string, T, T, T> _parser;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static ParseHelper()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine            bool isNullable = false;Di2015NewLine            if (type.GetGenericArguments().Length > 0 && type.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(Nullable<>))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                isNullable = true;Di2015NewLine                type = type.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ParameterExpression target = Expression.Parameter(typeof(string), "target");Di2015NewLine            ParameterExpression defaultValue = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "defaultValue");Di2015NewLine            ParameterExpression result = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "result");Di2015NewLine            if (isNullable)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Type helper = typeof(NullableParseHelper<>);Di2015NewLine                helper = helper.MakeGenericType(typeof(T), type);Di2015NewLine                MethodInfo parseMethod = helper.GetMethod("Parse");Di2015NewLine                _parser = Expression.Lambda<Func<string, T, T, T>>(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Call(parseMethod, target, defaultValue),Di2015NewLine                    target, defaultValue, result).Compile();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MethodInfo tryParseMethod = (from m in typeof(T).GetMethods()Di2015NewLine                                             where m.Name == "TryParse"Di2015NewLine                                             let ps = m.GetParameters()Di2015NewLine                                             where ps.Count() == 2Di2015NewLine                                                && ps[0].ParameterType == typeof(string)Di2015NewLine                                                && ps[1].ParameterType == typeof(T).MakeByRefType()Di2015NewLine                                             select m).SingleOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (tryParseMethod == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new InvalidOperationException(string.Format("Cannot find method {0}.TryParse(string, out {0})", type.FullName));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                _parser = Expression.Lambda<Func<string, T, T, T>>(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Condition(Di2015NewLine                        Expression.Call(tryParseMethod, target, result),Di2015NewLine                        result,Di2015NewLine                        defaultValue),Di2015NewLine                    target, defaultValue, result).Compile();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static T Parse(string target)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _parser.Invoke(target, default(T), default(T));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static T Parse(string target, T defaultValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _parser.Invoke(target, defaultValue, default(T));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static class NullableParseHelper<TBase> where TBase : structDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            private static readonly Func<string, TBase?, TBase, TBase?> _parser;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            static NullableParseHelper()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MethodInfo tryParseMethod = (from m in typeof(TBase).GetMethods()Di2015NewLine                                             where m.Name == "TryParse"Di2015NewLine                                             let ps = m.GetParameters()Di2015NewLine                                             where ps.Count() == 2Di2015NewLine                                                && ps[0].ParameterType == typeof(string)Di2015NewLine                                                && ps[1].ParameterType == typeof(TBase).MakeByRefType()Di2015NewLine                                             select m).SingleOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (tryParseMethod == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new InvalidOperationException(string.Format("Cannot find method {0}.TryParse(string, out {0})", typeof(TBase).FullName));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                ParameterExpression target = Expression.Parameter(typeof(string), "target");Di2015NewLine                ParameterExpression defaultValue = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TBase?), "defaultValue");Di2015NewLine                ParameterExpression result = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TBase), "result");Di2015NewLine                _parser = Expression.Lambda<Func<string, TBase?, TBase, TBase?>>(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Condition(Di2015NewLine                        Expression.Call(tryParseMethod, target, result),Di2015NewLine                        Expression.ConvertChecked(result, typeof(TBase?)),Di2015NewLine                        defaultValue),Di2015NewLine                    target, defaultValue, result).Compile();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public static TBase? Parse(string target, TBase? defaultValue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return _parser.Invoke(target, defaultValue, default(TBase));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1760937Di2015UniqueSeparator/*Di2015NewLine * JavaScript Pretty DateDi2015NewLine * Copyright (c) 2008 John Resig (jquery.com)Di2015NewLine * Licensed under the MIT license.Di2015NewLine */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Takes an ISO time and returns a string representing howDi2015NewLine// long ago the date represents.Di2015NewLinefunction prettyDate(time){Di2015NewLine    var date = new Date((time || "").replace(/-/g,"/").replace(/[TZ]/g," ")),Di2015NewLine    \diff = (((new Date()).getTime() - date.getTime()) / 1000),Di2015NewLine    \day_diff = Math.floor(diff / 86400);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ( isNaN(day_diff) || day_diff < 0 || day_diff >= 31 )Di2015NewLine    \return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return day_diff == 0 && (Di2015NewLine    \\diff < 60 && "just now" ||Di2015NewLine    \\diff < 120 && "1 minute ago" ||Di2015NewLine    \\diff < 3600 && Math.floor( diff / 60 ) + " minutes ago" ||Di2015NewLine    \\diff < 7200 && "1 hour ago" ||Di2015NewLine    \\diff < 86400 && Math.floor( diff / 3600 ) + " hours ago") ||Di2015NewLine    \day_diff == 1 && "Yesterday" ||Di2015NewLine    \day_diff < 7 && day_diff + " days ago" ||Di2015NewLine    \day_diff < 31 && Math.ceil( day_diff / 7 ) + " weeks ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// If jQuery is included in the page, adds a jQuery plugin to handle it as wellDi2015NewLineif ( typeof jQuery != "undefined" )Di2015NewLine    jQuery.fn.prettyDate = function(){Di2015NewLine    \return this.each(function(){Di2015NewLine    \\var date = prettyDate(this.title);Di2015NewLine    \\if ( date )Di2015NewLine    \\\jQuery(this).text( date );Di2015NewLine    \});Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine

1764913Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void addImageComment(string imageFlePath, string comments)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string jpegDirectory = Path.GetDirectoryName(imageFlePath);Di2015NewLine        string jpegFileName = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(imageFlePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BitmapDecoder decoder = null;Di2015NewLine        BitmapFrame bitmapFrame = null;Di2015NewLine        BitmapMetadata metadata = null;Di2015NewLine        FileInfo originalImage = new FileInfo(imageFlePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (File.Exists(imageFlePath))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // load the jpg file with a JpegBitmapDecoder    Di2015NewLine            using (Stream jpegStreamIn = File.Open(imageFlePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.ReadWrite, FileShare.None))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                decoder = new JpegBitmapDecoder(jpegStreamIn, BitmapCreateOptions.PreservePixelFormat, BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bitmapFrame = decoder.Frames[0];Di2015NewLine            metadata = (BitmapMetadata)bitmapFrame.Metadata;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (bitmapFrame != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                BitmapMetadata metaData = (BitmapMetadata)bitmapFrame.Metadata.Clone();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (metaData != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // modify the metadata   Di2015NewLine                    metaData.SetQuery("/app1/ifd/exif:{uint=40092}", comments);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // get an encoder to create a new jpg file with the new metadata. 1766369Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T BinarySearch<T, TKey>(this IList<T> list, Func<T, TKey> keySelector, TKey key)Di2015NewLine        where TKey : IComparable<TKey>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int min = 0;Di2015NewLine    int max = list.Count;Di2015NewLine    while (min < max)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int mid = (max + min) / 2;Di2015NewLine        T midItem = list[mid];Di2015NewLine        TKey midKey = keySelector(midItem);Di2015NewLine        int comp = midKey.CompareTo(key);Di2015NewLine        if (comp < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            min = mid + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (comp > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            max = mid - 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return midItem;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (min == max &&Di2015NewLine        keySelector(list[min]).CompareTo(key) == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return list[min];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw new InvalidOperationException("Item not found");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1767100Di2015UniqueSeparatorBindingSource
1767100Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class KeyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string PropertyName {get; set;}Di2015NewLine    public object Value {get; set;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static int Find(this BindingSource source, params Key[] keys)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    PropertyDescriptor[] properties = new PropertyDescriptor[keys.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ITypedList typedList = source as ITypedList;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(source.Count <= 0) return -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PropertyDescriptorCollection props;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(typedList != null) // obtain the PropertyDescriptors from the listDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        props = typedList.GetItemProperties(null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else // use the TypeDescriptor on the first element of the listDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        props = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(source[0]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < keys.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        properties[i] = props.Find(keys[i].PropertyName, true, true); // will throw if the property isn't foundDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < source.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        object row = source[i];Di2015NewLine        bool match = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int p = 0; p < keys.Count; p++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(properties[p].GetValue(row) != keys[p].Value))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                match = false;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(match) return i;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return -1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1768605Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass UrlBuilder2<T> {Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression<Func<T, object>> callExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public UrlBuilder2(Expression<Func<T,object>> callExpression) {Di2015NewLine        this.callExpression = callExpression;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString() {Di2015NewLine        MethodCallExpression call = (MethodCallExpression) callExpression.Body;Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendFormat("{0}/{1}.aspx", call.Object.Type.Name, call.Method.Name);Di2015NewLine        var delimiter = "?";Di2015NewLine        var formalParams = call.Method.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < formalParams.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            var actual = call.Arguments[i];Di2015NewLine            if (actual == null)Di2015NewLine                continue; // Do not put NULL to QueryStringDi2015NewLine            var formal = formalParams[i].Name;Di2015NewLine            sb.AppendFormat("{0}{1}={2}", delimiter, formal, HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(actual.ToString()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic void CanBuildUrlByClassAndMethodName() {Di2015NewLine    var str = new UrlBuilder2<MyForm>(c => c.MyMethod()).ToString();Di2015NewLine    str.Should().Be.EqualTo("MyForm/MyMethod.aspx");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic void CanBuildUrlByMethodWithParams() {Di2015NewLine    var str = new UrlBuilder2<MyForm>(c => c.MethodWithParams(2, "hello")).ToString();Di2015NewLine    str.Should().Be.EqualTo("MyForm/MyMethod.aspx?i=2&str=hello");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1768605Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyClass {Di2015NewLine    public void MyMethod() {}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass UrlBuilder3<T> {Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T, Action>> info;Di2015NewLine    public UrlBuilder3(Expression<Func<T, Action>> info) {Di2015NewLine        this.info = info;                Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString() {Di2015NewLine        UnaryExpression exp = (UnaryExpression)info.Body;Di2015NewLine        MethodCallExpression createDelegate = (MethodCallExpression)exp.Operand;Di2015NewLine        // 0-Action,1-x,2-Delegate as ConstantDi2015NewLine        ConstantExpression methodArgument = (ConstantExpression)createDelegate.Arguments[2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MethodInfo method = (MethodInfo)methodArgument.Value;Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("{0}/{1}.aspx", typeof(T).Name, method.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Test]Di2015NewLinepublic void UrlByDelegate() {Di2015NewLine    new UrlBuilder3<MyClass>(x => x.MyMethod).ToString()Di2015NewLine        .Should().Be.EqualTo("MyClass/MyMethod.aspx");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1769470Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Sub CopyWithProgress(ByVal ParamArray filenames As String())Di2015NewLine    ' Display the ProgressBar control.Di2015NewLine    pBar1.Visible = TrueDi2015NewLine    ' Set Minimum to 1 to represent the first file being copied.Di2015NewLine    pBar1.Minimum = 1Di2015NewLine    ' Set Maximum to the total number of files to copy.Di2015NewLine    pBar1.Maximum = filenames.LengthDi2015NewLine    ' Set the initial value of the ProgressBar.Di2015NewLine    pBar1.Value = 1Di2015NewLine    ' Set the Step property to a value of 1 to represent each file being copied.Di2015NewLine    pBar1.Step = 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' Loop through all files to copy.Di2015NewLine    Dim x As IntegerDi2015NewLine    for x = 1 To filenames.Length - 1Di2015NewLine        ' Copy the file and increment the ProgressBar if successful.Di2015NewLine        If CopyFile(filenames(x - 1)) = True ThenDi2015NewLine            ' Perform the increment on the ProgressBar.Di2015NewLine            pBar1.PerformStep()Di2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    Next xDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine

1770832Di2015UniqueSeparatortype ObservableSource<'T>() =     // 'Di2015NewLine    let protect f =Di2015NewLine        let mutable ok = falseDi2015NewLine        try Di2015NewLine            f()Di2015NewLine            ok <- trueDi2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine            Debug.Assert(ok, "IObserver methods must not throw!")Di2015NewLine            // TODO crash?Di2015NewLine    let mutable key = 0Di2015NewLine    // Why a Map and not a Dictionary?  Someone's OnNext() may unsubscribe, so we need threadsafe 'snapshots' of subscribers to Seq.iter overDi2015NewLine    let mutable subscriptions = Map.empty : Map<int,IObserver<'T>>  // 'Di2015NewLine    let next(x) = subscriptions |> Seq.iter (fun (KeyValue(_,v)) -> protect (fun () -> v.OnNext(x)))Di2015NewLine    let completed() = subscriptions |> Seq.iter (fun (KeyValue(_,v)) -> protect (fun () -> v.OnCompleted()))Di2015NewLine    let error(e) = subscriptions |> Seq.iter (fun (KeyValue(_,v)) -> protect (fun () -> v.OnError(e)))Di2015NewLine    let thisLock = new obj()Di2015NewLine    let obs = Di2015NewLine        { new IObservable<'T> with       // 'Di2015NewLine            member this.Subscribe(o) =Di2015NewLine                let k =Di2015NewLine                    lock thisLock (fun () ->Di2015NewLine                        let k = keyDi2015NewLine                        key <- key + 1Di2015NewLine                        subscriptions <- subscriptions.Add(k, o)Di2015NewLine                        k)Di2015NewLine                { new IDisposable with Di2015NewLine                    member this.Dispose() = Di2015NewLine                        lock thisLock (fun () -> Di2015NewLine                            subscriptions <- subscriptions.Remove(k)) } }Di2015NewLine    let mutable finished = falseDi2015NewLine    // The methods below are not thread-safe; the source ought not call these methods concurrentlyDi2015NewLine    member this.Next(x) =Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(not finished, "IObserver is already finished")Di2015NewLine        next xDi2015NewLine    member this.Completed() =Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(not finished, "IObserver is already finished")Di2015NewLine        finished <- trueDi2015NewLine        completed()Di2015NewLine    member this.Error(e) =Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(not finished, "IObserver is already finished")Di2015NewLine        finished <- trueDi2015NewLine        error eDi2015NewLine    // The object returned here is threadsafe; you can subscribe and unsubscribe (Dispose) concurrently from multiple threadsDi2015NewLine    member this.Value = obsDi2015NewLine

MainForm());Di2015NewLine            } catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine                // handle exception accordinglyDi2015NewLine            } finally {Di2015NewLine                _single.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            // Yes...Bring existing instance to top and activate it.Di2015NewLine      WindowState = FormWindowState.Normal;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // Bring window to front.Di2015NewLine                bool temp = TopMost;Di2015NewLine 1779135Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> TakeAllButLast<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source) {Di2015NewLine    var it = source.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    bool hasRemainingItems = false;Di2015NewLine    bool isFirst = true;Di2015NewLine    T item = default(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    do {Di2015NewLine        hasRemainingItems = it.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        if (hasRemainingItems) {Di2015NewLine            if (!isFirst) yield return item;Di2015NewLine            item = it.Current;Di2015NewLine            isFirst = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } while (hasRemainingItems);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine    var Seq = Enumerable.Range(1, 10);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(string.Join(", ", Seq.Select(x => x.ToString()).ToArray()));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(string.Join(", ", Seq.TakeAllButLast().Select(x => x.ToString()).ToArray()));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1780068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static PolyPolygon ReadPolyPolygon16(this BinaryReader reader)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Bounds (16 bytes)Di2015NewLine    Rectangle bounds = reader.ReadRectangle32();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // NumberOfPolygons (4 bytes)Di2015NewLine    int numberOfPolygons = reader.ReadInt32();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Count (4 bytes)Di2015NewLine    int count = reader.ReadInt32();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // PolygonPointCount (variable):Di2015NewLine    //      A NumberOfPolygons length array of 32-bit unsigned integersDi2015NewLine    var polygonPointCount = new int[numberOfPolygons];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < polygonPointCount.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        polygonPointCount[i] = reader.ReadInt32();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // aPoints (variable):Di2015NewLine    //      A Count length array of WMF PointS objectsDi2015NewLine    var points = new Point[count];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < points.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        points[i] = reader.ReadPoint16();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new PolyPolygon(bounds, numberOfPolygons, polygonPointCount, points);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1784559Di2015UniqueSeparator    private const uint LOCKFILE_EXCLUSIVE_LOCK = 0x00000002;Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Action WinIOError;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Win32Native()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BindingFlags bindingAttr = BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic;Di2015NewLine        var winIOErrorMethod = typeof(string).Assembly.GetType("System.IO.__Error").GetMethod("WinIOError", bindingAttr, null, Type.EmptyTypes, null);Di2015NewLine        WinIOError = (Action)Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action), winIOErrorMethod);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void LockFile(SafeFileHandle handle, bool exclusive, long offset, long length, Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (handle == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("handle");Di2015NewLine        if (handle.IsInvalid)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("An invalid file handle was specified.", "handle");Di2015NewLine        if (offset < 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("The offset cannot be negative.", "offset");Di2015NewLine        if (length < 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("The length cannot be negative.", "length");Di2015NewLine        if (action == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("action");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        LockFileUnsafe(handle, exclusive, offset, length, action);Di2015NewLine                   action();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                finallyDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine LOCKFILE_EXCLUSIVE_LOCK : 0;Di2015NewLine        if (!LockFileEx(handle, flags, 0, (int)length, (int)(length >> 32), native))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Overlapped.Free(native);Di2015NewLine            WinIOError();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    private static unsafe extern bool LockFileEx(SafeFileHandle handle, uint flags, uint mustBeZero, int countLow, int countHigh, NativeOverlapped* overlapped);Di2015NewLine

1787082Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<QuartzJob> GetQuartzInfo(IScheduler scheduler)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<QuartzJob> jobs = scheduler.JobGroupNames.SelectMany(   // Using SelectMany because there is an IEnumerable<QuartzJob> for each group and we want to flatten that.Di2015NewLine        groupName => scheduler.GetJobNames(groupName).Select(  // Returns an IEnumerable<QuartzJob> for each group name found.Di2015NewLine            jobName => Di2015NewLine                // We're doing a lot in this new but essentially it creates a new QuartzJob for each jobName/groupName comboDi2015NewLine                new QuartzJob(new Guid(groupName), new Guid(jobName),Di2015NewLine                    scheduler.GetTriggersOfJob(jobName, groupName).Select(trigger => trigger.Name)  // This transforms the GetTriggersOfJob into an IEnumerable<string> for use in the constructor of QuartzJobDi2015NewLine                    ))); Di2015NewLine    return new List<QuartzJob>(jobs);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1787082Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<QuartzJob> GetQuartzInfo(IScheduler scheduler)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<QuartzJob> jobs = from groupName in scheduler.JobGroupNamesDi2015NewLine                                  from jobName in scheduler.GetJobNames(groupName) // stacking the two froms is the equivalent of SelectMany because the first select is defaulted as the result of the second.Di2015NewLine                                  select new QuartzJob(new Guid(groupName), new Guid(jobName),Di2015NewLine                                      // this sub-select is to get just the IEnumerable<string> of trigger names needed for the constructor.Di2015NewLine                                      (from trigger in scheduler.GetTriggersOfJob(jobName, groupName)Di2015NewLine                                       select trigger.Name));Di2015NewLine    return new List<QuartzJob>(jobs);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1794947Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Used to prevent more than one worker.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private bool working = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Must use a lock to synch between UI thread and worker thread.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private object stateLock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Used to pass custom args into the worker function.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private class DataDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string query;Di2015NewLine        public string[] values;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Called in your UI thread in response to button press.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="Query"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="Values"></param>Di2015NewLine    public void UiRequestToDoWork(string Query, params string[] Values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (stateLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (working)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Do nothing!Di2015NewLine                Trace.WriteLine("Already working!");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var backgroundWorker = new System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLine                backgroundWorker.DoWork += new System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventHandler(backgroundWorker_DoWork);Di2015NewLine                backgroundWorker.RunWorkerAsync(new Data { query = Query, values = Values });Di2015NewLine                this.working = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Does all the background work.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sender"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e"></param>Di2015NewLine    void backgroundWorker_DoWork(object sender, System.ComponentModel.DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Data data = e.Argument as Data;Di2015NewLine            if (data != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Do your query in here - just simulating work with a sleep.Di2015NewLine                Trace.WriteLine("Working...");Di2015NewLine                System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Note: you can't access the UI directly here in the worker thread. UseDi2015NewLine                // Form.Invoke() instead to update the UI after your work is done.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Note the use of finally to be safe if exceptions get thrown.Di2015NewLine            lock (stateLock)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.working = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Trace.WriteLine("Finished!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1800737Di2015UniqueSeparator(defvar csharp-mode-syntax-table-no-special-slashDi2015NewLine  (let ((res (copy-syntax-table csharp-mode-syntax-table)))Di2015NewLine    (modify-syntax-entry ?\\\\ "w" res)Di2015NewLine    res)Di2015NewLine  "same as regular csharp-mode-syntax-table, only \\\\ is not an escape char")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine(defadvice c-guess-basic-syntax (after c-guess-basic-syntax-csharp-hack activate)Di2015NewLine  "following an #if/#endif, indentation gets screwey, fix it"Di2015NewLine  (let ((res ad-return-value))Di2015NewLine    (save-excursionDi2015NewLine      (save-match-dataDi2015NewLine        (cond ((and (eq major-mode 'csharp-mode)Di2015NewLine                    (eq 'statement-cont (caar res))Di2015NewLine                    (prognDi2015NewLine                      (goto-char (cadar res))Di2015NewLine                      (looking-at "#")))Di2015NewLine               ;; when following a #if, try for a redoDi2015NewLine               (goto-char (cadar res))Di2015NewLine               (setq ad-return-value (c-guess-basic-syntax)))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              ((and (eq major-mode 'csharp-mode)Di2015NewLine                    (eq 'string (caar res)))Di2015NewLine               ;; inside a stringDi2015NewLine               ;; check to see if it is a literalDi2015NewLine               ;; and if so, redo with modified syntax tableDi2015NewLine               (let ((p (point))Di2015NewLine                     (extent (c-literal-limits)))Di2015NewLine                 (when extentDi2015NewLine                   (goto-char (- (car extent) 1))Di2015NewLine                   (when (looking-at "@\\"")Di2015NewLine                     ;; yup, a string literalDi2015NewLine                     (with-syntax-table csharp-mode-syntax-table-no-special-slashDi2015NewLine                       (goto-char p)Di2015NewLine                       (setq ad-return-value (c-guess-basic-syntax))))))))))))Di2015NewLine

1802297Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring FirstName ="John1, John2, John3";Di2015NewLinestring MiddleInitial = "K1, K2, K3";Di2015NewLinestring LastName = "Kenndey1, Kenndey2, Kenndey3";Di2015NewLineList<String> fn = new List<String>(FirstName.Split(','));Di2015NewLineList<String> mi = new List<String>(MiddleInitial.Split(','));Di2015NewLineList<String> ln = new List<String>(LastName.Split(','));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<NameDetails> result = from f in fnDi2015NewLine        join i in mi on fn.IndexOf(f) equals mi.IndexOf(i)Di2015NewLine        join l in ln on fn.IndexOf(f) equals ln.IndexOf(l)Di2015NewLine        select new NameDetails {f, i, l};Di2015NewLine

1804706Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE TABLE dbo.EventScheduleDi2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine  EventID    INT,           -- FOREIGN KEY to event detailsDi2015NewLine  EventDate  SMALLDATETIME, -- if one-time eventDi2015NewLine  DayOfMonth TINYINT,       -- if once a month, e.g. 3rd of every monthDi2015NewLine  DayOfWeek  TINYINT,       -- if once a week, e.g. every Tuesday = 3Di2015NewLine  WeekDays   BIT,           -- if only on weekdays, e.g. 1 = mon-friDi2015NewLine  Weekends   BIT,           -- if only on weekends, e.g. 1 = sat-sunDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  -- the next two are combined, e.g. 2/2 = 2nd Monday of each monthDi2015NewLine  MonthlyInstance TINYINT,Di2015NewLine  MonthlyWeekday  TINYINTDi2015NewLine);Di2015NewLine
1804706Di2015UniqueSeparatorDECLARE Di2015NewLine  @dt   SMALLDATETIME,Di2015NewLine  @dm   TINYINT,Di2015NewLine  @dw   TINYINT,Di2015NewLine  @inst TINYINT;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECTDi2015NewLine  @dt   = '20091201',Di2015NewLine  @dm   = DATEPART(DAY, @dt)Di2015NewLine  @dw   = DATEPART(WEEKDAY, @dt),Di2015NewLine  @inst = DATEDIFF(WEEK, DATEADD(DAY, 1-@dm, @dt), @dt) + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT EventIDDi2015NewLine  FROM dbo.EventScheduleDi2015NewLine  WHERE EventDate = @dtDi2015NewLine  OR DayOfMonth = @dmDi2015NewLine  OR DayOfWeek = @dwDi2015NewLine  OR (Weekdays = 1 AND @dw BETWEEN 2 AND 6)Di2015NewLine  OR (Weekends = 1 AND @dw IN (1,7))Di2015NewLine  OR (MonthlyInstance = @inst AND MonthlyWeekday = @dw);Di2015NewLine
1804706Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE DATABASE test;Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineUSE test;Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET NOCOUNT ON;Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE TABLE dbo.CalendarDi2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine    dt SMALLDATETIME PRIMARY KEY,Di2015NewLine    dm TINYINT,Di2015NewLine    dw TINYINT,Di2015NewLine    mw TINYINT,Di2015NewLine    wd BITDi2015NewLine);Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- populate the table with the days from 2009Di2015NewLine-- (you will want more obviously; change TOP or add WHERE)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineINSERT dbo.Calendar(dt, dm, dw, mw, wd)Di2015NewLine  SELECTDi2015NewLine    dt, dm, dw, Di2015NewLine    mw = DATEDIFF(WEEK, DATEADD(DAY, 1-dm, dt), dt) + 1,Di2015NewLine    CASE WHEN dw IN (1, 7) THEN 0 ELSE 1 ENDDi2015NewLine    FROM Di2015NewLine    (Di2015NewLine      SELECTDi2015NewLine    \dt,Di2015NewLine    \dm = DATEPART(DAY, dt),Di2015NewLine    \dw = DATEPART(WEEKDAY, dt)Di2015NewLine      FROM Di2015NewLine      (Di2015NewLine    \SELECT dt = DATEADD(DAY, n-1, '20090101')Di2015NewLine    \FROMDi2015NewLine    \(Di2015NewLine    \  SELECT TOP 365 Di2015NewLine    \\n = ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY c1.[object_id])Di2015NewLine    \\FROM sys.all_columns AS c1Di2015NewLine    \\CROSS JOIN sys.all_columns AS c2Di2015NewLine    \\ORDER BY nDi2015NewLine    \) AS x) AS y) AS z;Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- create your schedule table:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE TABLE dbo.EventScheduleDi2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine  EventID      INT,           -- FOREIGN KEY to event detailsDi2015NewLine  EventDate    SMALLDATETIME, -- if one-time eventDi2015NewLine  [DayOfMonth] TINYINT,       -- if once a month, e.g. 3rd of every monthDi2015NewLine  [DayOfWeek]  TINYINT,       -- if once a week, e.g. every Tuesday = 3Di2015NewLine  Weekdays     BIT,           -- if only on weekdays, e.g. 1 = mon-friDi2015NewLine  Weekends     BIT,           -- if only on weekends, e.g. 1 = sat-sunDi2015NewLine                              -- if you want every day, set Weekdays+Weekends = 1Di2015NewLine  WeekOfMonth  TINYINT        -- if only the nth Tuesday etc.Di2015NewLine);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- create some events:Di2015NewLineINSERT dbo.EventScheduleDi2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine    EventID,Di2015NewLine    EventDate,Di2015NewLine    [DayOfMonth],Di2015NewLine    [DayOfWeek],Di2015NewLine    Weekdays,Di2015NewLine    Weekends,Di2015NewLine    WeekOfMonthDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine-- one on Jan 5th:Di2015NewLine    SELECT 1, '20090105', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULLDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- one on the 3rd of every month:Di2015NewLine    UNION ALL SELECT 2, NULL, 3, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULLDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- one every Tuesday:Di2015NewLine    UNION ALL SELECT 3, NULL, NULL, 3, NULL, NULL, NULLDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- one the 2nd Wednesday of each month:Di2015NewLine    UNION ALL SELECT 4, NULL, NULL, 4, NULL, NULL, 2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- one only on weekends:Di2015NewLine    UNION ALL SELECT 5, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 1, NULLDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- one only on weekdays:Di2015NewLine    UNION ALL SELECT 6, NULL, NULL, NULL, 1, NULL, NULL;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- now, we have 6 events, some of which will happen Di2015NewLine-- multiple times in any given date range.  So let'sDi2015NewLine-- try it:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDECLARE Di2015NewLine    @StartDate SMALLDATETIME, Di2015NewLine    @EndDate   SMALLDATETIME;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECTDi2015NewLine    @StartDate = '20090101',Di2015NewLine    @EndDate   = '20090108';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECTDi2015NewLine    d.dt,Di2015NewLine    e.EventIDDi2015NewLineFROMDi2015NewLine    dbo.Calendar AS dDi2015NewLine    INNER JOIN dbo.EventSchedule AS eDi2015NewLine    ONDi2015NewLine    (Di2015NewLine    \d.dt = e.EventDateDi2015NewLine    \OR d.dm = e.[DayOfMonth]Di2015NewLine    \OR (d.dw = e.[DayOfWeek] AND COALESCE(e.WeekOfMonth, d.mw) = d.mw)Di2015NewLine    \OR d.dw IN (1,7) AND e.Weekends = 1Di2015NewLine    \OR d.dw BETWEEN 2 AND 6 AND e.Weekdays = 1Di2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLine    -- now you can inner join to the event tableDi2015NewLine    -- to list the name, other details, etc.Di2015NewLine    WHEREDi2015NewLine    \d.dt BETWEEN @StartDate AND @EndDateDi2015NewLine    \ORDER BY d.dt, e.EventID;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDROP TABLE dbo.Calendar, dbo.EventSchedule;Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineUSE [master];Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDROP DATABASE test;Di2015NewLineGODi2015NewLine

1804841Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLinestatic class Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main() {Di2015NewLine        MyVector x = new MyVector(1, 2, 3), y = new MyVector(1, 2, 3),Di2015NewLine                 z = new MyVector(4,5,6);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(x == y); // trueDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(x == z); // falseDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(object.Equals(x, y)); // trueDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(object.Equals(x, z)); // falseDi2015NewLine        var comparer = EqualityComparer<MyVector>.Default;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(comparer.GetHashCode(x)); // should match yDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(comparer.GetHashCode(y)); // should match xDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(comparer.GetHashCode(z)); // *probably* differentDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(comparer.Equals(x,y)); // trueDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(comparer.Equals(x,z)); // falseDi2015NewLine        MyVector sum = x + z;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(sum);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic sealed class MyVector : IEquatable<MyVector>, IEnumerable<int> {Di2015NewLine    private readonly int[] data;Di2015NewLine    public int this[int index] {Di2015NewLine        get { return data[index]; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public MyVector(params int[] data) {Di2015NewLine        if (data == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("data");Di2015NewLine        this.data = (int[])data.Clone();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private int? hash;Di2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode() {Di2015NewLine        if (hash == null) {Di2015NewLine            int result = 13;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine                result = (result * 7) + data[i];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            hash = result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return hash.GetValueOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int Length { get { return data.Length; } }Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<int> GetEnumerator() {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            yield return data[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() {Di2015NewLine        return GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         return this == (obj as MyVector);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(MyVector obj) {Di2015NewLine        return this == obj;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString() {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder("[");Di2015NewLine        if (data.Length > 0) sb.Append(data[0]);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < data.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(',').Append(data[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(']');Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool operator ==(MyVector x, MyVector y) {Di2015NewLine        if(ReferenceEquals(x,y)) return true;Di2015NewLine        if(ReferenceEquals(x,null) || ReferenceEquals(y,null)) return false;Di2015NewLine        if (x.hash.HasValue && y.hash.HasValue && // exploit known different hashDi2015NewLine            x.hash.GetValueOrDefault() != y.hash.GetValueOrDefault()) return false;Di2015NewLine        int[] xdata = x.data, ydata = y.data;Di2015NewLine        if(xdata.Length != ydata.Length) return false;Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 0 ; i < xdata.Length ; i++) {Di2015NewLine            if(xdata[i] != ydata[i]) return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;        Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool operator != (MyVector x, MyVector y) {Di2015NewLine        return !(x==y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static MyVector operator +(MyVector x, MyVector y) {Di2015NewLine        if(x==null || y == null) throw new ArgumentNullException();Di2015NewLine        int[] xdata = x.data, ydata = y.data;Di2015NewLine        if(xdata.Length != ydata.Length) throw new InvalidOperationException("Length mismatch");Di2015NewLine        int[] result = new int[xdata.Length];Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 0 ; i < xdata.Length ; i++) {Di2015NewLine            result[i] = xdata[i] + ydata[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new MyVector(result);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine        public override void ResetValue(object component) {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override bool CanResetValue(object component) { return false; }Di2015NewLine        public override bool IsReadOnly {get {return true;}}Di2015NewLine        public override void SetValue(object component, object value) {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override object GetValue(object component) {Di2015NewLine            return ((ListWrapper)component).list;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override Type ComponentType {Di2015NewLine            get { return typeof(ListWrapper); 1807511Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[Split]Di2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine    @SearchString VARCHAR(8000),Di2015NewLine    @Separator VARCHAR(5),Di2015NewLine    @MaxItems INTDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineRETURNS @strtable TABLE (strval VARCHAR(8000))Di2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLineDECLARE @tmpStr VARCHAR(8000), @intSeparatorLength INT, @counter intDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIF @MaxItems IS NULLDi2015NewLine    SET @MaxItems = 2147483647 -- max intDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @intSeparatorLength = LEN(@Separator)Di2015NewLineSET @Counter = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @tmpStr = @SearchStringDi2015NewLine    WHILE 1=1 BEGINDi2015NewLine    \INSERT INTO @strtable VALUES ( SUBSTRING(@tmpStr, 0 ,CHARINDEX(@Separator, @tmpStr)))Di2015NewLine    \SET @tmpStr = SUBSTRING(@tmpStr,CHARINDEX(@Separator,@tmpStr)+LEN(@Separator),8000)Di2015NewLine    \SET @counter = @counter + 1\\Di2015NewLine    \IF (CHARINDEX(@Separator,@tmpStr) < 1 OR @counter >= @MaxItems)Di2015NewLine    \\BREAKDi2015NewLine    ENDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineRETURNDi2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine

1808055Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IDictionary> ToEnumerableDictionary(this IDataReader dataReader)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var list = new List<Dictionary<string, object>>();Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<int, string> keys = null;Di2015NewLine    while (dataReader.Read())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(keys == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            keys = new Dictionary<int, string>();Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < dataReader.FieldCount; i++)Di2015NewLine                keys.Add(i, dataReader.GetName(i));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var dictionary = keys.ToDictionary(ordinalKey => ordinalKey.Value, ordinalKey => dataReader[ordinalKey.Key]);Di2015NewLine        list.Add(dictionary);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return list.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1815107Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static double Calculate(UInt64 currentCounter, uint inDuration, uint holdDuration, uint outDuration)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    UInt64 curTime;Di2015NewLine    double ret;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    curTime = currentCounter % (inDuration + 2*holdDuration + outDuration); //this wrapping should really be handled by the callerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (curTime < inDuration)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ret = 0.5 * (1.0 - Math.Cos(2.0 * Math.PI * (inDuration - curTime) / (2.0 * inDuration)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (curTime < inDuration + holdDuration)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ret = 0.0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (curTime < inDuration + holdDuration + outDuration)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ret = 0.5 * (1.0 - Math.Cos(2.0 * Math.PI * (curTime - inDuration - holdDuration) / (2.0 * outDuration)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ret = 1.0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1815107Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor (ctr = 0; ctr < 20000; ctr++)Di2015NewLine    Calculate(ctr, 2500, 2250, 3000);Di2015NewLine
1815107Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static double Calculate(UInt64 currentCounter, uint duration, uint inDuration, uint outDuration)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    UInt64 curTime;Di2015NewLine    double ret;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //should check that inDuration + outDuration <= durationDi2015NewLine    curTime = currentCounter % duration; //this wrapping should really be handled by the callerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (curTime < inDuration)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ret = 0.5 * (1.0 - Math.Cos(2.0 * Math.PI * (inDuration - curTime) / (2.0 * inDuration)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (curTime >= (duration - outDuration))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ret = 0.5 * (1.0 - Math.Cos(2.0 * Math.PI * (outDuration + duration - curTime) / (2.0 * outDuration)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ret = 1.0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1815600Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> GetItems<T>(this IEnumerable collection,Di2015NewLine        Func<T, IEnumerable> selector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stack<IEnumerable<T>> stack = new Stack<IEnumerable<T>>();Di2015NewLine        stack.Push(collection.OfType<T>());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (stack.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IEnumerable<T> items = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in items)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return item;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                IEnumerable<T> children = selector(item).OfType<T>();Di2015NewLine                stack.Push(children);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1816558Di2015UniqueSeparator  private static int[] BuildShuffledIndexArray( int size ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     int[] array = new int[size];Di2015NewLine     Random rand = new Random();Di2015NewLine     for ( int currentIndex = array.Length - 1; currentIndex > 0; currentIndex-- ) {Di2015NewLine        int nextIndex = rand.Next( currentIndex + 1 );Di2015NewLine        Swap( array, currentIndex, nextIndex );Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     return array;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static void Swap( IList<int> array, int firstIndex, int secondIndex ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     if ( array[firstIndex] == 0 ) {Di2015NewLine        array[firstIndex] = firstIndex;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     if ( array[secondIndex] == 0 ) {Di2015NewLine        array[secondIndex] = secondIndex;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     int temp = array[secondIndex];Di2015NewLine     array[secondIndex] = array[firstIndex];Di2015NewLine     array[firstIndex] = temp;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

1819926Di2015UniqueSeparatorDi2015NewLineclass CanUsbSafeHandle : SafeHandleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private EventHandler _receiveCallBack;Di2015NewLine    private readonly object _receiveCallBackLock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler ReceiveCallBackDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        addDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_receiveCallBackLock)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bool hasListeners = (_receiveCallBack != null);Di2015NewLine                _receiveCallBack += value;Di2015NewLine                //call canusb_setReceiveCallBack only when 1 or more listeners were addedDi2015NewLine                //and there were previously no listenersDi2015NewLine                if (!hasListeners && (_receiveCallBack != null))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    canusb_setReceiveCallBack(this, setCallBack);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        removeDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_receiveCallBackLock)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bool hasListeners = (_receiveCallBack != null);Di2015NewLine                _receiveCallBack -= value;Di2015NewLine                //call canusb_setReceiveCallBack only when there are no more listeners.Di2015NewLine                if(hasListeners && (_receiveCallBack == null))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    canusb_setReceiveCallBack(this, null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CanUsbSafeHandle()Di2015NewLine        : base(IntPtr.Zero, true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool IsInvalidDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return handle == IntPtr.Zero; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override bool ReleaseHandle()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return canusb_Close(handle);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (disposing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_receiveCallBackLock)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _receiveCallBack = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        base.Dispose(disposing);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1820117Di2015UniqueSeparator//Namespace referenceDi2015NewLineusing System.Management;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Returns MAC Address from first Network Card in ComputerDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>MAC Address in string format</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic string FindMACAddress()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //create out management class object using theDi2015NewLine    //Win32_NetworkAdapterConfiguration class to get the attributesDi2015NewLine    //af the network adapterDi2015NewLine    ManagementClass mgmt = new ManagementClass("Win32_NetworkAdapterConfiguration");Di2015NewLine    //create our ManagementObjectCollection to get the attributes withDi2015NewLine    ManagementObjectCollection objCol = mgmt.GetInstances();Di2015NewLine    string address = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine    //My modification to the codeDi2015NewLine    var description = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine    //loop through all the objects we findDi2015NewLine    foreach (ManagementObject obj in objCol)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (address == String.Empty)  // only return MAC Address from first cardDi2015NewLine 1820261Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static int Weekdays(DateTime dtmStart, DateTime dtmEnd)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This function includes the start and end date in the count if they fall on a weekdayDi2015NewLine        int dowStart = ((int)dtmStart.DayOfWeek == 0 ? 7 : (int)dtmStart.DayOfWeek);Di2015NewLine        int dowEnd = ((int)dtmEnd.DayOfWeek == 0 ? 7 : (int)dtmEnd.DayOfWeek);Di2015NewLine        TimeSpan tSpan = dtmEnd - dtmStart;Di2015NewLine        if (dowStart <= dowEnd)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (((tSpan.Days / 7) * 5) + Math.Max((Math.Min((dowEnd + 1), 6) - dowStart), 0));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return (((tSpan.Days / 7) * 5) + Math.Min((dowEnd + 6) - Math.Min(dowStart, 6), 5));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  [1]: http://www.eggheadcafe.com/community/aspnet/2/44982/how-to-calculate-num-of-w.aspxDi2015NewLine

1820889Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace YourLibraryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static class MyLinqDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<T> Where<T>(Di2015NewLine            this IMyDal<T> dal,Di2015NewLine            Expression<Func<T, bool>> predicate)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BinaryExpression be = predicate.Body as BinaryExpression;Di2015NewLine            var me = be.Left as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            if(me == null) throw new InvalidOperationException("don't be silly");Di2015NewLine            if(me.Expression != predicate.Parameters[0]) throw new InvalidOperationException("direct properties only, please!");Di2015NewLine            string member = me.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine            object value;Di2015NewLine            switch (be.Right.NodeType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case ExpressionType.Constant:Di2015NewLine                    value = ((ConstantExpression)be.Right).Value;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case ExpressionType.MemberAccess:Di2015NewLine                    var constMemberAccess = ((MemberExpression)be.Right);Di2015NewLine                    var capture = ((ConstantExpression)constMemberAccess.Expression).Value;Di2015NewLine                    switch (constMemberAccess.Member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        case MemberTypes.Field:Di2015NewLine                            value = ((FieldInfo)constMemberAccess.Member).GetValue(capture);Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case MemberTypes.Property:Di2015NewLine                            value = ((PropertyInfo)constMemberAccess.Member).GetValue(capture, null);Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        default:Di2015NewLine                            throw new InvalidOperationException("simple captures only, please");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    throw new InvalidOperationException("more complexity");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return dal.Find(member, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public interface IMyDal<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<T> Find(string member, object value);Di2015NewLine 1821352Di2015UniqueSeparator    internal static string GetString(string str, string lang)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(str)) throw new ArgumentNullException("empty language query string");Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(lang)) throw new ArgumentNullException("no language resource given");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // culture-specific file, i.e. "LangResources.fr"Di2015NewLine        Stream stream = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetManifestResourceStream("PIAE.LangResources."+lang);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // resource not found, revert to default resourceDi2015NewLine        if (null == stream)Di2015NewLine        {                                                                   Di2015NewLine            stream = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetManifestResourceStream("PIAE.Properties.LangResources.resources");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ResourceReader reader = new ResourceReader(stream);Di2015NewLine        IDictionaryEnumerator en= reader.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        while (en.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (en.Key.Equals(str))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return en.Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // string not translated, revert to default resourceDi2015NewLine        return LangResources.ResourceManager.GetString(str);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class DumperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class DumpDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Dump(bool spacesInsteadOfTab)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _spacesIndeadOfTab = spacesInsteadOfTab;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly StringBuilder _sb = new _sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly bool _spacesIndeadOfTab;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int _currentIndent;Di2015NewLine        public int CurrentIndentDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return _currentIndent;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _currentIndent = value > 0 ? value : 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void IncrementIndent()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CurrentIndent += 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void DecrementIndent()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CurrentIndent -= 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void AppendIndent()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_spacesIndeadOfTab)Di2015NewLine                _sb.Append(' ', _currentIndent * 4);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                _sb.Append('\\t', _currentIndent);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Log(string logValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AppendIndent();Di2015NewLine            _sb.AppendLine(logValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Log(string logValue, params object[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AppendIndent();Di2015NewLine            _sb.AppendFormat(logValue, args);Di2015NewLine            _sb.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Dump TakeDump(object objectToDump, int maxDepth)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dump result = new Dump(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int currentDepth = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TakeDump(ref result, ref currentDepth, maxDepth, objectToDump);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void TakeDump(ref Dump result, ref int currentDepth, int maxDepth, object objectToDump)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        currentDepth++;Di2015NewLine        if (currentDepth > maxDepth)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.IncrementIndent();Di2015NewLine            result.Log("MaxDepth ({0}) Reached.", maxDepth);Di2015NewLine            result.DecrementIndent();Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var objectType = objectToDump.GetType();Di2015NewLine        result.Log("--> {0}", objectType.FullName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        result.IncrementIndent();Di2015NewLine        var fields = objectType.GetFields(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (fields.Count() == 0)Di2015NewLine            result.Log("No fields");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var fieldInfo in fields)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var fieldValue = fieldInfo.GetValue(objectToDump);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (fieldValue == null)Di2015NewLine                result.Log("{0} is null", fieldValueType.FullName, fieldInfo.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var fieldValueType = fieldValue.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (fieldValueType.IsValueType)Di2015NewLine                result.Log("{2} as {0} (ToString: {1})", fieldValueType.FullName, fieldValue.ToString(), fieldInfo.Name);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                TakeDump(ref result, ref currentDepth, maxDepth, fieldValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        result.DecrementIndent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1824549Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static JsonParseException ProcessException(WebException webEx)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var stream = webEx.Response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine        using (var memory = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var buffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine            var read = 0;Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                read = stream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                memory.Write(buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            } while (read > 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            memory.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine            int pageSize = (int)memory.Length;Di2015NewLine            byte[] bytes = new byte[pageSize];Di2015NewLine            memory.Read(bytes, 0, pageSize);Di2015NewLine            memory.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine            string data = new StreamReader(memory).ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            memory.Close();Di2015NewLine            DefaultMeta meta = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<DefaultMeta>(data);Di2015NewLine            return new JsonParseException(meta.Meta, meta.Meta.Error, webEx);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1827589Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing namespace
1827589Di2015UniqueSeparator#pragma onceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#include <string>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// .Net System NamespacesDi2015NewLineusing namespace System;Di2015NewLineusing namespace System::Runtime::InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// C# ProjectsDi2015NewLineusing namespace CsharpProject;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine// String Conversion FunctionsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinlineDi2015NewLineString ^ ToManagedString(const char * pString) {Di2015NewLine return Marshal::PtrToStringAnsi(IntPtr((char *) pString));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinlineDi2015NewLineconst std::string ToStdString(String ^ strString) {Di2015NewLine IntPtr ptrString = IntPtr::Zero;Di2015NewLine std::string strStdString;Di2015NewLine try {Di2015NewLine  ptrString = Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(strString);Di2015NewLine  strStdString = (char *) ptrString.ToPointer();Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine finally {Di2015NewLine  if (ptrString != IntPtr::Zero) {Di2015NewLine   Marshal::FreeHGlobal(ptrString);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine return strStdString;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1827762Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Comparison<Person> Create(CompareOptions opt) {Di2015NewLine  switch (opt) {Di2015NewLine    case CompareOptions.ByFirstName: (x,y) => x.FirstName.CompareTo(y.FirstName);Di2015NewLine    case CompareOptions.ByLastName: (x,y) => x.LastName.CompareTo(y.LastName);Di2015NewLine    case CompareOptions.BySalary: (x,y) => x.Salary - y.Salary;Di2015NewLine    default: throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1827762Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<Person> SortPeople(Di2015NewLine   this List<Person> list, Di2015NewLine   CompareOptions opt1,Di2015NewLine   SortOrder ord) )Di2015NewLine   var original = Create(opt1);Di2015NewLine   var comp = original;Di2015NewLine   if( ord == SortOrder.Descending ) {Di2015NewLine     comp = (x,y) => -(orig(x,y));Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   list.Sort(comp);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1827762Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<Person> SortPeople(Di2015NewLine   this List<Person> list, Di2015NewLine   CompareOptions opt1,Di2015NewLine   SortOrder ord) )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   list.Sort( (x,y) => {Di2015NewLine     int comp = 0;Di2015NewLine     switch (opt) {Di2015NewLine       case CompareOptions.ByFirstName: comp = x.FirstName.CompareTo(y.FirstName);Di2015NewLine       case CompareOptions.ByLastName: comp = x.LastName.CompareTo(y.LastName);Di2015NewLine       case CompareOptions.BySalary: comp = x.Salary.CompareTo(y.Salary);Di2015NewLine       default: throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     if ( ord == SortOrder.Descending ) {Di2015NewLine       comp = -comp;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     return comp;Di2015NewLine   });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1827802Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace ThreadTrackerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLine    using System.Collections.ObjectModel;Di2015NewLine    using System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class TrackedThreadDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static readonly List<Thread> m_threadList = new List<Thread>();Di2015NewLine        private readonly Thread m_thread;Di2015NewLine        private readonly ParameterizedThreadStart m_start1;Di2015NewLine        private readonly ThreadStart m_start2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public TrackedThread(ParameterizedThreadStart start)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.m_start1 = start;Di2015NewLine            this.m_thread = new Thread(this.StartThreadParameterized);Di2015NewLine            lock (m_threadList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m_threadList.Add(this.m_thread);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public TrackedThread(ThreadStart start)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.m_start2 = start;Di2015NewLine            this.m_thread = new Thread(this.StartThread);Di2015NewLine            lock (m_threadList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m_threadList.Add(this.m_thread);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public TrackedThread(ParameterizedThreadStart start, int maxStackSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.m_start1 = start;Di2015NewLine            this.m_thread = new Thread(this.StartThreadParameterized, maxStackSize);Di2015NewLine            lock (m_threadList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m_threadList.Add(this.m_thread);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public TrackedThread(ThreadStart start, int maxStackSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.m_start2 = start;Di2015NewLine            this.m_thread = new Thread(this.StartThread, maxStackSize);Di2015NewLine            lock (m_threadList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m_threadList.Add(this.m_thread);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static int CountDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (m_threadList)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return m_threadList.Count;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<Thread> ThreadListDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock(m_threadList)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return new ReadOnlyCollection<Thread>(m_threadList);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // either: (a) expose the thread object itself via a property or,Di2015NewLine        // (b) expose the other Thread public methods you need to replicate.Di2015NewLine        // This example uses (a).Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Thread ThreadDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return this.m_thread;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void StartThreadParameterized(object obj)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.m_start1(obj);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock(m_threadList)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    m_threadList.Remove(this.m_thread);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void StartThread()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.m_start2();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine 1828956Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IEnumerable<decimal> IgnoreSmallValues(List<decimal> list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        decimal runningTotal = 0M;Di2015NewLine        foreach (decimal value in list)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // if the value is less than 1% of the running total, then ignore itDi2015NewLine            if (runningTotal == 0M || value >= 0.01M * runningTotal)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                runningTotal += value;Di2015NewLine                yield return value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
1828956Di2015UniqueSeparator        List<decimal> payments = new List<decimal>() {Di2015NewLine            123.45M,Di2015NewLine            234.56M,Di2015NewLine            .01M,Di2015NewLine            345.67M,Di2015NewLine            1.23M,Di2015NewLine            456.78MDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (decimal largePayment in IgnoreSmallValues(payments))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // handle the large payments so that I can divert all the small payments to my own bank account. 1828956Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class FishingHookDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Index { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public decimal RunningTotal { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public Func<decimal, bool> Criteria { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<decimal> FishingHookIteration(IEnumerable<decimal> list, FishingHook hook)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        hook.Index = 0;Di2015NewLine        hook.RunningTotal = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach(decimal value in list)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // the hook object may define a Criteria delegate thatDi2015NewLine            // determines whether to skip the current valueDi2015NewLine            if (hook.Criteria == null || hook.Criteria(value))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                hook.RunningTotal += value;Di2015NewLine                yield return value;Di2015NewLine                hook.Index++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
1828956Di2015UniqueSeparator        List<decimal> payments = new List<decimal>() {Di2015NewLine            123.45M,Di2015NewLine            .01M,Di2015NewLine            345.67M,Di2015NewLine            234.56M,Di2015NewLine            1.23M,Di2015NewLine            456.78MDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FishingHook hook = new FishingHook();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        decimal min = 0;Di2015NewLine        hook.Criteria = x => x > min; // exclude any values that are less than/equal to the defined minimumDi2015NewLine        foreach (decimal value in FishingHookIteration(payments, hook))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // update the minimumDi2015NewLine            if (value > min) min = value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Index: {0}, Value: {1}, Running Total: {2}", hook.Index, value, hook.RunningTotal);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Resultint output is:Di2015NewLine        //Index: 0, Value: 123.45, Running Total: 123.45Di2015NewLine        //Index: 1, Value: 345.67, Running Total: 469.12Di2015NewLine        //Index: 2, Value: 456.78, Running Total: 925.90Di2015NewLine        // we've skipped the values .01, 234.56, and 1.23Di2015NewLine

1831070Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void WriteTsv<T>(this IEnumerable<T> data, TextWriter output)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    PropertyDescriptorCollection props = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    foreach (PropertyDescriptor prop in props)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        output.Write(prop.DisplayName); // headerDi2015NewLine        output.Write("\\t");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    output.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    foreach (T item in data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyDescriptor prop in props)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            output.Write(prop.Converter.ConvertToString(Di2015NewLine                 prop.GetValue(item)));Di2015NewLine            output.Write("\\t");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        output.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
