1832779Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Result fetchPage(String query, int targetPage)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int pageSize = extractLimitValue(query);Di2015NewLine    int skipLimit = pageSize * (targetPage - 1);Di2015NewLine    String token = skipAhead(query, skipLimit);Di2015NewLine    return sdb.select(query, token);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate String skipAhead(String query, int skipLimit)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    String tempQuery = replaceClause(query, "SELECT", "count(*)");Di2015NewLine    int accumulatedCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    String token = "";Di2015NewLine    do {Di2015NewLine        int tempLimit = skipLimit - accumulatedCount;Di2015NewLine        tempQuery = replaceClause(tempQuery , "LIMIT", tempLimit + "");Di2015NewLine        Result tempResult = sdb.select(query, token);Di2015NewLine        token = tempResult.getToken();Di2015NewLine        accumulatedCount += tempResult.getCount();Di2015NewLine    } while (accumulatedCount < skipLimit);Di2015NewLine    return token;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate int extractLimitValue(String query) {...}Di2015NewLineprivate String replaceClause(String query, String clause, String value){...}Di2015NewLine

1836816Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class ItemDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Weight { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<T> Weighted<T>(this IEnumerable<T> list, Func<T, int> weight)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (T t in list)Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < weight(t); i++)Di2015NewLine                    yield return t;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<Item> list = new List<Item>();Di2015NewLine            list.Add(new Item { Name = "one", Weight = 5 });Di2015NewLine            list.Add(new Item { Name = "two", Weight = 1 });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Random rand = new Random(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            list = list.Weighted<Item>(x => x.Weight).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int index = rand.Next(list.Count());Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(list.ElementAt(index).Name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1843110Di2015UniqueSeparatorwith srcData as (Di2015NewLine\select\row_number() over(order by t.EffectiveDate) as rn,Di2015NewLine\\\t.TransactionId, t.ItemId, t.Code, t.EffectiveDate, t.CreateDateDi2015NewLine\from\#TableName tDi2015NewLine\join\@sequence sDi2015NewLine\on\\t.Code = s.CodeDi2015NewLine\where\t.ItemId = @item_idDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineselect\d.TransactionId, d.ItemId, d.Code, d.EffectiveDate, d.CreateDateDi2015NewLinefrom\srcData dDi2015NewLinejoin\@sequence sDi2015NewLineon\\d.rn = s.sequenceDi2015NewLineand\\d.Code = s.CodeDi2015NewLineorder by d.rn;Di2015NewLine
1843110Di2015UniqueSeparatordeclare @tempData table (rn int, TransactionId smallint, ItemId smallint, Code smallint, EffectiveDate datetime, CreateDate datetime);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewith srcData as (Di2015NewLine\select\row_number() over(order by t.EffectiveDate) as rn,Di2015NewLine\\\t.TransactionId, t.ItemId, t.Code, t.EffectiveDate, t.CreateDateDi2015NewLine\from\#TableName tDi2015NewLine\join\@sequence sDi2015NewLine\on\\t.Code = s.CodeDi2015NewLine\where\t.ItemId = @item_idDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineinsert\@tempDataDi2015NewLine\\(rn, TransactionId, ItemId, Code, EffectiveDate, CreateDate)Di2015NewLineselect\d.rn, d.TransactionId, d.ItemId, d.Code, d.EffectiveDate, d.CreateDateDi2015NewLinefrom\srcData dDi2015NewLinejoin\@sequence sDi2015NewLineon\\d.rn = s.sequenceDi2015NewLineand\\d.Code = s.Code;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Verify we have matching hash/sums\Di2015NewLineifDi2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine\( (select sum(Code) from @sequence) = (select sum(Code) from @tempData) )Di2015NewLine\andDi2015NewLine\( (select checksum_agg(checksum(sequence, Code)) from @sequence) = (select checksum_agg(checksum(rn, Code)) from @tempData) )Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLinebegin;Di2015NewLine\-- Match - return the resultsetDi2015NewLine\select\d.TransactionId, d.ItemId, d.Code, d.EffectiveDate, d.CreateDateDi2015NewLine\from\@tempData dDi2015NewLine\order by d.rn;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLine

1843590Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ImageHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine    public struct BITMAPINFOHEADERDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public BITMAPINFOHEADER(ushort bpp, int height, int width)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            biBitCount = bpp;Di2015NewLine            biWidth = width;Di2015NewLine            biHeight = height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            biSize = (uint)Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(BITMAPINFOHEADER));Di2015NewLine            biPlanes = 1; // must be 1Di2015NewLine            biCompression = 0; // no compressionDi2015NewLine            biSizeImage = 0; // no compression, so can be 0Di2015NewLine            biXPelsPerMeter = 0;Di2015NewLine            biYPelsPerMeter = 0;Di2015NewLine            biClrUsed = 0;Di2015NewLine            biClrImportant = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Store(BinaryWriter bw)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Store(bw, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Store(BinaryWriter bw, uint[] colorPalette)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Must maintain order for file writingDi2015NewLine            bw.Write(biSize);Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(biWidth);Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(biHeight);Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(biPlanes);Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(biBitCount);Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(biCompression);Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(biSizeImage);Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(biXPelsPerMeter);Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(biYPelsPerMeter);Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(biClrUsed);Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(biClrImportant);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // write color palette if 8 bpp or lessDi2015NewLine            if (biBitCount <= 8)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (colorPalette == null)Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentNullException("bpp is 8 or less, color palette is required");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                uint paletteCount = BITMAPFILEHEADER.CalcPaletteSize(biBitCount) / 4;Di2015NewLine                if (colorPalette.Length < paletteCount)Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentException(string.Format("bpp is 8 or less, color palette must contain {0} colors", paletteCount));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (uint color in colorPalette)Di2015NewLine                    bw.Write(color);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public uint biSize;Di2015NewLine        public int biWidth;Di2015NewLine        public int biHeight;Di2015NewLine        public ushort biPlanes;Di2015NewLine        public ushort biBitCount;Di2015NewLine        public uint biCompression;Di2015NewLine        public uint biSizeImage;Di2015NewLine        public int biXPelsPerMeter;Di2015NewLine        public int biYPelsPerMeter;Di2015NewLine        public uint biClrUsed;Di2015NewLine        public uint biClrImportant;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine    public struct BITMAPFILEHEADERDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public BITMAPFILEHEADER(BITMAPINFOHEADER info, out uint sizeOfImageData)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bfType = 0x4D42;  // Microsoft supplied value to indicate Bitmap 'BM'Di2015NewLine            bfReserved1 = 0;Di2015NewLine            bfReserved2 = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // calculate amount of space needed for color paletteDi2015NewLine            uint paletteSize = CalcPaletteSize(info.biBitCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bfOffBits = 54 + paletteSize; // default value + paletteSizeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // calculate size of imageDi2015NewLine            sizeOfImageData = (uint)(CalcRowSize(info.biWidth * info.biBitCount) * info.biHeight);Di2015NewLine            bfSize = sizeOfImageData + bfOffBits;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static int CalcRowSize(int bits)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ((((bits) + 31) / 32) * 4);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static uint CalcPaletteSize(int bpp)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // 8 bpp or less, needs an uint per colorDi2015NewLine            if (bpp <= 8)Di2015NewLine                return 4 * (uint)Math.Pow(2, bpp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // no palette needed for 16bpp or higherDi2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Store(BinaryWriter bw)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Must maintain order for file writingDi2015NewLine            bw.Write(bfType);Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(bfSize);Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(bfReserved1);Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(bfReserved2);Di2015NewLine            bw.Write(bfOffBits);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ushort bfType;Di2015NewLine        public uint bfSize;Di2015NewLine        public short bfReserved1;Di2015NewLine        public short bfReserved2;Di2015NewLine        public uint bfOffBits;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static byte[] GetByteArray(Bitmap image)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IntPtr hbmOld;Di2015NewLine        IntPtr hBitmap;Di2015NewLine        IntPtr hDC;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create infoheaderDi2015NewLine        BITMAPINFOHEADER bih = new BITMAPINFOHEADER(1, image.Height, image.Width);Di2015NewLine        // set black and white for 1 bit color paletteDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create fileheader and get data sizeDi2015NewLine        uint sizeOfImageData;Di2015NewLine        BITMAPFILEHEADER bfh = new BITMAPFILEHEADER(bih, out sizeOfImageData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create device context in memoryDi2015NewLine        hDC = Win32.CreateCompatibleDC(IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create a 1 bpp DIBDi2015NewLine        IntPtr pBits = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        hBitmap = Win32.CreateDIBSection(hDC, ref bih, 1, ref pBits, IntPtr.Zero, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // selet DIB into device contextDi2015NewLine        hbmOld = Win32.SelectObject(hDC, hBitmap);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromHdc(hDC))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             g.DrawImage(image, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] imageData = new byte[sizeOfImageData];Di2015NewLine        byte[] fileData;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream((int)bfh.bfSize))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (BinaryWriter w = new BinaryWriter(ms))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bfh.Store(w);Di2015NewLine                // store bitmapinfoheader with 1 bpp color palette for black and whiteDi2015NewLine                bih.Store(w, new uint[] { (uint)0x0, (uint)0xffffff });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // copy image data into imageData bufferDi2015NewLine                Marshal.Copy(pBits, imageData, 0, imageData.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // write imageData to streamDi2015NewLine                w.Write(imageData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                w.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            fileData = ms.GetBuffer();Di2015NewLine            ms.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // select old objectDi2015NewLine        if (hbmOld != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            Win32.SelectObject(hDC, hbmOld);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // delete memory bitmapDi2015NewLine        if (hBitmap != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            Win32.DeleteObject(hBitmap);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // delete memory device contextDi2015NewLine        if (hDC != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            Win32.DeleteDC(hDC);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return fileData;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1845126Di2015UniqueSeparatorNullable<T>

1847458Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IList<T>[] Split<T>(this IList<T> source, int elementCount)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // What the heck, it's easy to implement...Di2015NewLine    IList<T>[] ret = new IList<T>[(source.Count + elementCount - 1) Di2015NewLine                                  / elementCount];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < ret.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int start = i * elementCount;Di2015NewLine        int size = Math.Min(elementCount, source.Count - i * start);Di2015NewLine        T[] tmp = new T[size];Di2015NewLine        // Would like CopyTo with a count, but never mindDi2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; i < size; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tmp[j] = source[j + start];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ret[i] = tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1851789Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TreeViewSample : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private TreeView _treeView;Di2015NewLine    public TreeViewSample()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this._treeView = new System.Windows.Forms.TreeView();Di2015NewLine        this._treeView.Location = new System.Drawing.Point(12, 12);Di2015NewLine        this._treeView.Size = new System.Drawing.Size(200, 400);Di2015NewLine        this._treeView.AfterExpand +=Di2015NewLine            new TreeViewEventHandler(TreeView_AfterExpand);Di2015NewLine        this.ClientSize = new System.Drawing.Size(224, 424);Di2015NewLine        this.Controls.Add(this._treeView);Di2015NewLine        this.Text = "TreeView Lazy Load Sample";Di2015NewLine        InitializeTreeView();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void TreeView_AfterExpand(object sender, TreeViewEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.Node.Nodes.Count == 1 && e.Node.Nodes[0].Tag == "dummy")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // this node has not yet been populated, launch a threadDi2015NewLine            // to get the dataDi2015NewLine            ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(state =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IEnumerable<SomeClass> childItems = GetData();Di2015NewLine                // load the data into the tree view (on the UI thread)Di2015NewLine                _treeView.BeginInvoke((Action)delegateDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    PopulateChildren(e.Node, childItems);Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void PopulateChildren(TreeNode parent, IEnumerable<SomeClass> childItems)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TreeNode child;Di2015NewLine        TreeNode dummy;Di2015NewLine        TreeNode originalDummyItem = parent.Nodes[0];Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in childItems)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            child = new TreeNode(item.Text);Di2015NewLine            dummy = new TreeNode("Loading. Please wait...");Di2015NewLine            dummy.Tag = "dummy";Di2015NewLine            child.Nodes.Add(dummy);Di2015NewLine            parent.Nodes.Add(child);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        originalDummyItem.Remove();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<SomeClass> GetData()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // simulate that this takes some timeDi2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLine        return new List<SomeClass>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new SomeClass{Text = "One"},Di2015NewLine            new SomeClass{Text = "Two"},Di2015NewLine            new SomeClass{Text = "Three"}Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void InitializeTreeView()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TreeNode rootNode = new TreeNode("Root");Di2015NewLine        TreeNode dummyNode = new TreeNode("Loading. Please wait...");Di2015NewLine        dummyNode.Tag = "dummy";Di2015NewLine        rootNode.Nodes.Add(dummyNode);Di2015NewLine        _treeView.Nodes.Add(rootNode);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SomeClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Text { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1852370Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic int ColumnToValue(string column) {Di2015NewLine    int value = 0;Di2015NewLine    int pow = 1;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = column.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {Di2015NewLine        value += pow * (column[i] - 'A' + 1);Di2015NewLine        pow *= 26;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return value;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic string ValueToColumn(int value) {Di2015NewLine    if (value == 0) {Di2015NewLine        return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    while (value > 0) {Di2015NewLine        int digit = value % 26;Di2015NewLine        if (digit == 0) {Di2015NewLine            sb.Insert(0, 'Z');Di2015NewLine            return sb.Insert(0, ValueToColumn(value / 26 - 1)).ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sb.Insert(0,(char)(digit + 'A' - 1));Di2015NewLine        value = (value - digit) / 26;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1862537Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int TrimCompareIgnoreCase(string a, string b) {Di2015NewLine   int indexA = 0;Di2015NewLine   int indexB = 0;Di2015NewLine   while (indexA < a.Length && Char.IsWhiteSpace(a[indexA])) indexA++;Di2015NewLine   while (indexB < b.Length && Char.IsWhiteSpace(b[indexB])) indexB++;Di2015NewLine   int lenA = a.Length - indexA;Di2015NewLine   int lenB = b.Length - indexB;Di2015NewLine   while (lenA > 0 && Char.IsWhiteSpace(a[indexA + lenA - 1])) lenA--;Di2015NewLine   while (lenB > 0 && Char.IsWhiteSpace(b[indexB + lenB - 1])) lenB--;Di2015NewLine   if (lenA == 0 && lenB == 0) return 0;Di2015NewLine   if (lenA == 0) return 1;Di2015NewLine   if (lenB == 0) return -1;Di2015NewLine   int result = String.Compare(a, indexA, b, indexB, Math.Min(lenA, lenB), true);Di2015NewLine   if (result == 0) {Di2015NewLine      if (lenA < lenB) result--;Di2015NewLine      if (lenA > lenB) result++;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1862537Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring a = "  asdf ";Di2015NewLinestring b = " ASDF \\t   ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(TrimCompareIgnoreCase(a, b));Di2015NewLine

1862829Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLinepublic static class TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //So:Di2015NewLine        myClass mC = new myClass();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        mC.first = "ok";Di2015NewLine        mC.second = 12;Di2015NewLine        mC.third = "ko";Di2015NewLine        //then would return its type from definition :Di2015NewLine        Tester(() => mC.first); // writes "mC.first = ok"Di2015NewLine        //and Di2015NewLine        Tester(() => mC.second); // writes "mC.second = 12"Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static string GetName(Expression expr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (expr.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var me = (MemberExpression)expr;Di2015NewLine            string name = me.Member.Name, subExpr = GetName(me.Expression);Di2015NewLine            return string.IsNullOrEmpty(subExpr)Di2015NewLine                ? name : (subExpr + "." + name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void Tester<TValue>(Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<TValue>> selector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TValue value = selector.Compile()();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string name = GetName(selector.Body);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(name + " = " + value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1866558Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> TakeRandom<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var array = source.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    return ShuffleInternal(array, Math.Min(count, array.Length)).Take(count);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<T> ShuffleInternal<T>(T[] array, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (var n = 0; n < count; n++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var k = ThreadSafeRandom.Next(n, array.Length);Di2015NewLine        var temp = array[n];Di2015NewLine        array[n] = array[k];Di2015NewLine        array[k] = temp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return array;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1866950Di2015UniqueSeparatordouble dx = x2 - x1;Di2015NewLinedouble dy = y2 - y1;Di2015NewLinedouble length = Math.Sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);Di2015NewLineif (length > 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    dx /= length;Di2015NewLine    dy /= length;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinedx *= length - radius;Di2015NewLinedy *= length - radius;Di2015NewLineint x3 = (int)(x1 + dx);Di2015NewLineint y3 = (int)(y1 + dy);Di2015NewLine
1867022Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace MaLio.StopWatch {Di2015NewLine    class Program {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Container container =     new System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // may be a formatter created elsewhereDi2015NewLine            if (formatter.SurrogateSelector == null) {Di2015NewLine                formatter.SurrogateSelector = new StopWatchSelector();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                formatter.SurrogateSelector.ChainSelector(new StopWatchSelector());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (System.IO.MemoryStream stream = new System.IO.MemoryStream()) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                formatter.Serialize(stream, container);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                stream.Flush();Di2015NewLine 1868169Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FormatRuleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Pattern { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public CultureInfo Culture { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FormatRule(string pattern, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Pattern = pattern;Di2015NewLine        Culture = culture;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1868169Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<FormatRule> Rules = new List<FormatRule>()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /* Add rules in order of precedence specifying a cultureDi2015NewLine     * that can handle the pattern, I've chosen en-US and fr-FRDi2015NewLine     * for this example, but equally any culture could be swappedDi2015NewLine     * in for various formats you may need to use */Di2015NewLine    new FormatRule(@"^0.\\d+$", CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo("en-US")),Di2015NewLine    new FormatRule(@"^0,\\d+$", CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo("fr-FR")),Di2015NewLine    new FormatRule(@"^[1-9]+.\\d{4,}$", CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo("en-US")),Di2015NewLine    new FormatRule(@"^[1-9]+,\\d{4,}$", CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo("fr-FR")),Di2015NewLine    new FormatRule(@"^-?[1-9]{1,3}(,\\d{3,})*(\\.\\d*)?$", CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo("en-US")),Di2015NewLine    new FormatRule(@"^-?[1-9]{1,3}(.\\d{3,})*(\\,\\d*)?$", CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo("fr-FR")),Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* The default rule */Di2015NewLine    new FormatRule(string.Empty, CultureInfo.CurrentCulture)Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1868169Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic CultureInfo FindProvider(string numberString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach(FormatRule rule in Rules)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Regex.IsMatch(numberString, rule.Pattern))Di2015NewLine            return rule.Culture;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return Rules[Rules.Count - 1].Culture;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1868169Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic float ParseValue(string valueString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float value = 0;Di2015NewLine    NumberStyles style = NumberStyles.Any;Di2015NewLine    IFormatProvider provider = FindCulture(valueString).NumberFormat;Di2015NewLine    if (float.TryParse(numberString, style, provider, out value))Di2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        throw new InvalidCastException(string.Format("Value '{0}' cannot be parsed with any of the providers in the rule set.", valueString));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1875608Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing.Imaging;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace BitmapSimilarityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public interface IBitmapCompareDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double GetSimilarity(Bitmap a, Bitmap b);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class BitmapCompare: IBitmapCompareDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public struct RGBdataDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public int r;Di2015NewLine            public int g;Di2015NewLine            public int b;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public int GetLargest()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if(r>b)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if(r>g)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return 1;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return 2;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return 3;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private RGBdata ProcessBitmap(Bitmap a)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BitmapData bmpData = a.LockBits(new Rectangle(0,0,a.Width,a.Height),ImageLockMode.ReadOnly,PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLine            IntPtr ptr = bmpData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine            RGBdata data = new RGBdata();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            unsafeDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte* p = (byte*)(void*)ptr;Di2015NewLine                int offset = bmpData.Stride - a.Width * 3;Di2015NewLine                int width = a.Width * 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int y = 0; y < a.Height; ++y)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int x = 0; x < width; ++x)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        data.r += p[0];             //gets red valuesDi2015NewLine                        data.g += p[1];             //gets green valuesDi2015NewLine                        data.b += p[2];             //gets blue valuesDi2015NewLine                        ++p;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    p += offset;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            a.UnlockBits(bmpData);Di2015NewLine            return data;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public double GetSimilarity(Bitmap a, Bitmap b)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RGBdata dataA = ProcessBitmap(a);Di2015NewLine            RGBdata dataB = ProcessBitmap(b);Di2015NewLine            double result = 0;Di2015NewLine            int averageA = 0;Di2015NewLine            int averageB = 0;Di2015NewLine            int maxA = 0;Di2015NewLine            int maxB = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            maxA = ((a.Width * 3) * a.Height);Di2015NewLine            maxB = ((b.Width * 3) * b.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (dataA.GetLargest())            //Find dominant color to compareDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case 1:Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        averageA = Math.Abs(dataA.r / maxA);Di2015NewLine                        averageB = Math.Abs(dataB.r / maxB);Di2015NewLine                        result = (averageA - averageB) / 2;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                case 2:Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        averageA = Math.Abs(dataA.g / maxA);Di2015NewLine                        averageB = Math.Abs(dataB.g / maxB);Di2015NewLine                        result = (averageA - averageB) / 2;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                case 3:Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        averageA = Math.Abs(dataA.b / maxA);Di2015NewLine                        averageB = Math.Abs(dataB.b / maxB);Di2015NewLine                        result = (averageA - averageB) / 2;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result = Math.Abs((result + 100) / 100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (result > 1.0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result -= 1.0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static BitmapCompare SimpleCompare;Di2015NewLine        static Bitmap searchImage;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static private void Line()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < Console.BufferWidth; x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Write("*");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void CheckDirectory(string directory,double percentage,Bitmap sImage)Di2015NewLine       files = dir.GetFiles("*.jpg");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (DirectoryNotFoundException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Bad percentage)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(f.Name);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Match of: {0}", sim);Di2015NewLine                    Line(); Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine 1878719Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Tuple<Boolean, T?> TryParse<T>(this String candidate)Di2015NewLine        where T : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T? value = null;Di2015NewLine        Boolean success = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var parser = ParsingBinder<T>.GetParser();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine                value = parser(candidate);Di2015NewLine                success = true;Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        catch (FormatException) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new Tuple<Boolean,T?>(success, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ParsingBinder<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static Func<String, T> parser;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Func<String, T> GetParser()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (parser == null)Di2015NewLine                parser = getParser();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return parser;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Func<String, T> getParser()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo methodInfo Di2015NewLine            = typeof(T).GetMethod(Di2015NewLine    \\        "Parse", new [] { typeof(String) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (methodInfo == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception(Di2015NewLine    \                "Unable to retrieve a \\"Parse\\" method for type.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (Func<String, T>)DelegateDi2015NewLine    \.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<String, T>), methodInfo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1880041Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static String Justify(String s, Int32 count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (count <= 0)Di2015NewLine            return s;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Int32 middle = s.Length / 2;Di2015NewLine        IDictionary<Int32, Int32> spaceOffsetsToParts = new Dictionary<Int32, Int32>();Di2015NewLine        String[] parts = s.Split(' ');Di2015NewLine        for (Int32 partIndex = 0, offset = 0; partIndex < parts.Length; partIndex++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            spaceOffsetsToParts.Add(offset, partIndex);Di2015NewLine            offset += parts[partIndex].Length + 1; // +1 to count space that was removed by SplitDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (var pair in spaceOffsetsToParts.OrderBy(entry => Math.Abs(middle - entry.Key)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            count--;Di2015NewLine            if (count < 0)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            parts[pair.Value] += ' ';Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return String.Join(" ", parts);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void Main(String[] args) {Di2015NewLine        String s = "skvb sdkvkd s  kc wdkck sdkd sdkje sksdjs skd";Di2015NewLine        String j = Justify(s, 5);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Initial: " + s);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Result:  " + j);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1880306Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IList<R> TransformTree<T, R>(this IEnumerable<T> collection,Di2015NewLine        Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> entitySelector,Di2015NewLine        Func<R, IList<R>> pocoSelector,Di2015NewLine        Func<T, R> transformer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var transformedList = new List<R>();Di2015NewLine        var stack = new Stack<IEnumerable<T>>();Di2015NewLine        var parents = new Dictionary<IEnumerable<T>, R>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        stack.Push(collection);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (stack.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IEnumerable<T> items = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            R transformedParent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IList<R> parentChildren = parents.TryGetValue(items, out transformedParent)Di2015NewLine                                          ? pocoSelector(transformedParent)Di2015NewLine                                          : transformedList;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var item in items)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                R transformedItem = transformer(item);Di2015NewLine                parentChildren.Add(transformedItem);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                IEnumerable<T> children = entitySelector(item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                stack.Push(children);Di2015NewLine                parents.Add(children, transformedItem);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return transformedList;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string inputFilename = "input.txt";Di2015NewLine        string outputFilename = "output.txt";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] dateColumnNames = { "DDate" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (StreamReader stream = new StreamReader(File.Open(inputFilename, FileMode.Open)))Di2015NewLine        using (StreamWriter writer = new StreamWriter(File.Open(outputFilename, FileMode.Create)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int[] dateColumns = new int[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string line = stream.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                if (line == null)Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Split into columns.Di2015NewLine                string[] columns = line.Split('|');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                  .Where(x => dateColumnNames.Contains(x.Name))Di2015NewLine                    .Select(x => x.Index)Di2015NewLine                    .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine dateColumns)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (columns.Length > i)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Regex regex = new columns);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Make other replacements.Di2015NewLine                line = line.Replace(@"BegAtt|EndAtt", "BegAtt#|EndAtt#");Di2015NewLine                line = line.Replace(@"Cc|*RFP", "CC|RFP");Di2015NewLine                line = line.Replace(@"<swme> ", string.Empty);Di2015NewLine                line = line.Replace(@" </swme>", ";");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Output line.Di2015NewLine 1884400Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace WizardryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using System;Di2015NewLine    using System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLine    using System.ComponentModel.Composition;Di2015NewLine    using System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class UserWizardCreationServiceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [Import]Di2015NewLine        private IEnumerable<Lazy<IWizardProvider, IWizardProviderMetadata>> WizardProviders { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IWizard CreateWizard()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IWizard wizard = null;Di2015NewLine            Lazy<IWizardProvider, IWizardProviderMetadata> lazyWizardProvider = null;Di2015NewLine            IWizardProvider wizardProvider = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // example 1: get a provider that can create a "White Wizard"Di2015NewLine            lazyWizardProvider = WizardProviders.FirstOrDefault(provider => provider.Metadata.Name == "White Wizard");Di2015NewLine            if (lazyWizardProvider != null)Di2015NewLine                wizardProvider = lazyWizardProvider.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // example 2: get a provider that can create a wizard that can cast the "booblah" spellDi2015NewLine            lazyWizardProvider = WizardProviders.FirstOrDefault(provider => provider.Metadata.Spells.Contains("booblah"));Di2015NewLine            if (lazyWizardProvider != null)Di2015NewLine                wizardProvider = lazyWizardProvider.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // finally, for whatever wizard provider we have, use it to create a wizardDi2015NewLine            if (wizardProvider != null)Di2015NewLine                wizard = wizardProvider.CreateWizard();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return wizard;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1885709Di2015UniqueSeparator  Regex ElementExpression = new Regex(Di2015NewLine            @"<(?'tag'\\w+?)(?'attributes'.*?)>" + // match first tag, and name it 'tag'Di2015NewLine            @"(?'text'[^<>]*?)" + // match text content, name it 'text'Di2015NewLine            @"</\\k'tag'>" // match last tag, denoted by 'tag'Di2015NewLine            , RegexOptions.Multiline | RegexOptions.Compiled | RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Regex WhiteSpaceExpression = new Regex(@"\\A(()|(\\s)|(\\r))*\\Z", RegexOptions.Multiline | RegexOptions.Compiled | RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  text = ElementExpression.Replace(text, delegate(Match match){Di2015NewLine        if (match.Groups.Count > 0){Di2015NewLine           Group textGroup = match.Groups["text"];Di2015NewLine           if (!WhiteSpaceExpression.IsMatch(textGroup.Value)){Di2015NewLine              return String.Format("<{0}{1}>{2}</{0}>", match.Groups["tag"].Value, match.Groups["attributes"].Value, HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(textGroup.Value));Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           else{Di2015NewLine              return String.Format("<{0}{1} />", match.Groups["tag"].Value, match.Groups["attributes"].Value);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return match.Value;Di2015NewLine  });Di2015NewLine

1889557Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing.Drawing2D;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace DefinedRectanglesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class DisplayRectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public DisplayRect(Rectangle dispArea, Color dispColor, bool dashed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            m_area = dispArea;Di2015NewLine            m_areaColor = dispColor;Di2015NewLine            m_solidLines = !dashed;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Rectangle m_area;Di2015NewLine        Color m_areaColor;Di2015NewLine        bool m_solidLines;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Rectangle Bounds { get { return m_area; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void OnPaint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!m_area.IntersectsWith(e.ClipRectangle)) { return; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Graphics g = e.Graphics;Di2015NewLine            using (Pen p = new Pen(m_areaColor))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (m_solidLines)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    p.DashStyle = DashStyle.Solid;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    p.DashStyle = DashStyle.Dot;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // This could be improved to just the border lines that need to be redrawnDi2015NewLine                g.DrawRectangle(p, m_area);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void OnHitTest(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Invalidation Rectangles don't include the outside bounds, while pen-drawn rectangles do.Di2015NewLine            // We'll inflate the rectangle by 1 to make up for this issue so we can handle the hit region properly.Di2015NewLine            Rectangle r = m_area;Di2015NewLine            r.Inflate(1, 1);Di2015NewLine            if (r.Contains(e.X, e.Y))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m_solidLines = !m_solidLines;Di2015NewLine                Control C = (Control)sender;Di2015NewLine                C.Invalidate(r);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1893961Di2015UniqueSeparatorDiff GetDiff(byte[] a, byte[] b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Diff diff = new Diff();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < a.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (a[i] != b[i])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            diff.Points.Add(new DiffPoint(i, a[i]));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return diff;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Mutator method - turns "b" into the original "a"Di2015NewLinevoid ApplyDiff(byte[] b, Diff diff)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (DiffPoint point in diff.Points)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        b[point.Index] = point.Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Copy method - recreates "a" leaving "b" intactDi2015NewLinebyte[] ApplyDiffCopy(byte[] b, Diff diff)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] a = new byte[b.Length];Di2015NewLine    int startIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (DffPoint point in diff.Points)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = startIndex; i < point.Index; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            a[i] = b[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        a[point.Index] = point.Value;Di2015NewLine        startIndex = point.Index + 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    for (int j = startIndex; j < b.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        a[j] = b[j];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return a;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestruct DiffPointDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Index;Di2015NewLine    public byte Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DiffPoint(int index, byte value) : this()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Index = index;Di2015NewLine        this.Value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass DiffDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Diff()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Points = new List<DiffPoint>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public List<DiffPoint> Points { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1896695Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring input = "b|123|1,op|999";Di2015NewLineint key = 0;Di2015NewLineint value = 0;Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < input.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine   switch (input[i]) {Di2015NewLine      case ',':Di2015NewLine         value = i + 1;Di2015NewLine         break;Di2015NewLine      case '|':Di2015NewLine        Options.Add(input.Substring(key, key == value ? i - key : value - key - 1), input.Substring(value, i - value));Di2015NewLine        key = i + 1;Di2015NewLine        value = i + 1;Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineOptions.Add(input.Substring(key, key == value ? input.Length - key : value - key - 1), input.Substring(value));Di2015NewLine

1897484Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void QuicksortSequential<T>(T[] arr, int left, int right) Di2015NewLinewhere T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (right > left)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int pivot = Partition(arr, left, right);Di2015NewLine        QuicksortSequential(arr, left, pivot - 1);Di2015NewLine        QuicksortSequential(arr, pivot + 1, right);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void QuicksortParallelOptimised<T>(T[] arr, int left, int right) Di2015NewLinewhere T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int SEQUENTIAL_THRESHOLD = 2048;Di2015NewLine    if (right > left)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (right - left < SEQUENTIAL_THRESHOLD)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            QuicksortSequential(arr, left, right);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int pivot = Partition(arr, left, right);Di2015NewLine            Parallel.Do(Di2015NewLine                () => QuicksortParallelOptimised(arr, left, pivot - 1),Di2015NewLine                () => QuicksortParallelOptimised(arr, pivot + 1, right));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1897931Di2015UniqueSeparator    IEnumerable RecurseObjects(object root) {Di2015NewLine        Queue items = new Queue();Di2015NewLine        items.Enqueue(root);Di2015NewLine        while (items.Count > 0) {Di2015NewLine            object obj = items.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine            yield return obj;Di2015NewLine            Control control = obj as Control;Di2015NewLine            if (control != null) {Di2015NewLine                // regular controls and sub-controlsDi2015NewLine                foreach (Control item in control.Controls) {Di2015NewLine                    items.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // top-level menu itemsDi2015NewLine                ToolStrip ts = control as ToolStrip;Di2015NewLine                if (ts != null) {Di2015NewLine                    foreach(ToolStripItem tsi in ts.Items) {Di2015NewLine                        items.Enqueue(tsi);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // child menusDi2015NewLine            ToolStripDropDownItem tsddi = obj as ToolStripDropDownItem;Di2015NewLine            if (tsddi != null && tsddi.HasDropDownItems) {Di2015NewLine                foreach (ToolStripItem item in tsddi.DropDownItems) {Di2015NewLine                    items.Enqueue(item);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1899355Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Intersect<T>(params IEnumerable<T>[] enums) {Di2015NewLine    return Intersect<T>(null, enums);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<T> Intersect<T>(IComparer<T> comparer, params IEnumerable<T>[] enums) {Di2015NewLine    if(enums == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("enums");Di2015NewLine    if(enums.Length == 0) return Enumerable.Empty<T>();Di2015NewLine    if(enums.Length == 1) return enums[0];Di2015NewLine    if(comparer == null) comparer = Comparer<T>.Default;Di2015NewLine    return IntersectImpl(comparer, enums);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<T> IntersectImpl<T>(IComparer<T> comparer, IEnumerable<T>[] enums) {Di2015NewLine    IEnumerator<T>[] iters = new IEnumerator<T>[enums.Length];Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        // create iterators and move as far as the first itemDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < enums.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            if(!(iters[i] = enums[i].GetEnumerator()).MoveNext()) {Di2015NewLine                yield break; // no data for one of the iteratorsDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        bool first = true;Di2015NewLine        T lastValue = default(T);Di2015NewLine        do { // get the next item from the first sequenceDi2015NewLine            T value = iters[0].Current;Di2015NewLine            if (!first && comparer.Compare(value, lastValue) == 0) continue; // dup in first sourceDi2015NewLine            bool allTrue = true;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i < iters.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine                var iter = iters[i];Di2015NewLine                // if any sequence isn't there yet, progress it; if any sequenceDi2015NewLine                // ends, we're all doneDi2015NewLine                while (comparer.Compare(iter.Current, value) < 0) {Di2015NewLine                    if (!iter.MoveNext()) goto alldone; // nasty, butDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // if any sequence is now **past** value, then short-circuitDi2015NewLine                if (comparer.Compare(iter.Current, value) > 0) {Di2015NewLine                    allTrue = false;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // so all sequences have this valueDi2015NewLine            if (allTrue) yield return value;Di2015NewLine            first = false;Di2015NewLine            lastValue = value;Di2015NewLine        } while (iters[0].MoveNext());Di2015NewLine    alldone:Di2015NewLine        ;Di2015NewLine    } finally { // clean up all iteratorsDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < iters.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            if (iters[i] != null) {Di2015NewLine                try { iters[i].Dispose(); }Di2015NewLine                catch { }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1900393Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static class TypeSystem {Di2015NewLine    internal static Type GetElementType(Type seqType) {Di2015NewLine        Type ienum = FindIEnumerable(seqType);Di2015NewLine        if (ienum == null) return seqType;Di2015NewLine        return ienum.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static Type FindIEnumerable(Type seqType) {Di2015NewLine        if (seqType == null || seqType == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        if (seqType.IsArray)Di2015NewLine            return typeof(IEnumerable<>).MakeGenericType(seqType.GetElementType());Di2015NewLine        if (seqType.IsGenericType) {Di2015NewLine            foreach (Type arg in seqType.GetGenericArguments()) {Di2015NewLine                Type ienum = typeof(IEnumerable<>).MakeGenericType(arg);Di2015NewLine                if (ienum.IsAssignableFrom(seqType)) {Di2015NewLine                    return ienum;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Type[] ifaces = seqType.GetInterfaces();Di2015NewLine        if (ifaces != null && ifaces.Length > 0) {Di2015NewLine            foreach (Type iface in ifaces) {Di2015NewLine                Type ienum = FindIEnumerable(iface);Di2015NewLine                if (ienum != null) return ienum;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (seqType.BaseType != null && seqType.BaseType != typeof(object)) {Di2015NewLine            return FindIEnumerable(seqType.BaseType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1901730Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IList<T> Shuffled<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, Random generator)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine    if (generator == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("generator");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //copyDi2015NewLine    var result = source.ToList();Di2015NewLine    //shuffle the copyDi2015NewLine    for (int i = result.Count - 1; i > 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int RandomIndex = generator.Next(i + 1);Di2015NewLine        T temp = result[i];Di2015NewLine        result[i] = result[RandomIndex];Di2015NewLine        result[RandomIndex] = temp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

SwissBankAccount(int accountNumber) : base(accountNumber) {}Di2015NewLine  override protected void DoTransfer(BankAccount destinationAccount, User authorizedUser, decimal amount) Di2015NewLine 1905169Di2015UniqueSeparator  class Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine      byte[] bytes = new byte[] { 1, 2, 5, 0, 6 };Di2015NewLine      byte[] another = new byte[] { 1, 2, 5, 0, 6 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Hashtable ht = new Hashtable(new ByteArrayComparer());Di2015NewLine      ht.Add(bytes, "hi");Di2015NewLine      System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(ht.ContainsKey(another));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class ByteArrayComparer : IEqualityComparer {Di2015NewLine      public int GetHashCode(object obj) {Di2015NewLine        byte[] arr = obj as byte[];Di2015NewLine        int hash = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (byte b in arr) hash ^= b;Di2015NewLine        return hash;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      public new bool Equals(object x, object y) {Di2015NewLine        byte[] arr1 = x as byte[];Di2015NewLine        byte[] arr2 = y as byte[];Di2015NewLine        if (arr1.Length != arr2.Length) return false;Di2015NewLine        for (int ix = 0; ix < arr1.Length; ++ix)Di2015NewLine          if (arr1[ix] != arr2[ix]) return false;Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

1905259Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EncryptionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const string InitVector = "T=A4rAzu94ez-dra";Di2015NewLine    private const int KeySize = 256;Di2015NewLine    private const int PasswordIterations = 1000; //2;Di2015NewLine    private const string SaltValue = "d=?ustAF=UstenAr3B@pRu8=ner5sW&h59_Xe9P2za-eFr2fa&ePHE@ras!a+uc@";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string Decrypt(string encryptedText, string passPhrase)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] encryptedTextBytes = Convert.FromBase64String(encryptedText);Di2015NewLine        byte[] initVectorBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(InitVector);Di2015NewLine        byte[] passwordBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(passPhrase);Di2015NewLine        string plainText;Di2015NewLine        byte[] saltValueBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(SaltValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Rfc2898DeriveBytes password = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(passwordBytes, saltValueBytes, PasswordIterations);Di2015NewLine        byte[] keyBytes = password.GetBytes(KeySize / 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RijndaelManaged rijndaelManaged = new RijndaelManaged { Mode = CipherMode.CBC };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (ICryptoTransform decryptor = rijndaelManaged.CreateDecryptor(keyBytes, initVectorBytes))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream(encryptedTextBytes))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //TODO: Need to look into this more. Assuming encrypted text is longer than plain but there is probably a better wayDi2015NewLine                        byte[] plainTextBytes = new byte[encryptedTextBytes.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        int decryptedByteCount = cryptoStream.Read(plainTextBytes, 0, plainTextBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                        plainText = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(plainTextBytes, 0, decryptedByteCount);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (CryptographicException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            plainText = string.Empty; // Assume the error is caused by an invalid passwordDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return plainText;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string Encrypt(string plainText, string passPhrase)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string encryptedText;Di2015NewLine        byte[] initVectorBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(InitVector);Di2015NewLine        byte[] passwordBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(passPhrase);Di2015NewLine        byte[] plainTextBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(plainText);Di2015NewLine        byte[] saltValueBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(SaltValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Rfc2898DeriveBytes password = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(passwordBytes, saltValueBytes, PasswordIterations);Di2015NewLine        byte[] keyBytes = password.GetBytes(KeySize / 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RijndaelManaged rijndaelManaged = new RijndaelManaged {Mode = CipherMode.CBC};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (ICryptoTransform encryptor = rijndaelManaged.CreateEncryptor(keyBytes, initVectorBytes))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    cryptoStream.Write(plainTextBytes, 0, plainTextBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                    cryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    byte[] cipherTextBytes = memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                    encryptedText = Convert.ToBase64String(cipherTextBytes);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return encryptedText;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1905259Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SimpleEncryptionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region ConstructorDi2015NewLine    public SimpleEncryption(string password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] passwordBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(password);Di2015NewLine        byte[] saltValueBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(SaltValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _DeriveBytes = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(passwordBytes, saltValueBytes, PasswordIterations);Di2015NewLine        _InitVectorBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(InitVector);Di2015NewLine        _KeyBytes = _DeriveBytes.GetBytes(32);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Private FieldsDi2015NewLine    private readonly Rfc2898DeriveBytes _DeriveBytes;Di2015NewLine    private readonly byte[] _InitVectorBytes;Di2015NewLine    private readonly byte[] _KeyBytes;Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const string InitVector = "T=A4rAzu94ez-dra";Di2015NewLine    private const int PasswordIterations = 1000; 1909710Di2015UniqueSeparator\\b0*([0-9]{1,4}|[1-7][0-9]{4}|8[0-5][0-9]{3}|86[0-3][0-9]{2}|86400)\\bDi2015NewLine
1909710Di2015UniqueSeparatorFirst, break into equal length ranges:Di2015NewLine  0 - 9Di2015NewLine  10 - 99Di2015NewLine  100 - 999Di2015NewLine  1000 - 9999Di2015NewLine  10000 - 86400Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSecond, break into ranges that yield simple regexes:Di2015NewLine  0 - 9Di2015NewLine  10 - 99Di2015NewLine  100 - 999Di2015NewLine  1000 - 9999Di2015NewLine  10000 - 79999Di2015NewLine  80000 - 85999Di2015NewLine  86000 - 86399Di2015NewLine  86400 - 86400Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTurn each range into a regex:Di2015NewLine  [0-9]Di2015NewLine  [1-9][0-9]Di2015NewLine  [1-9][0-9]{2}Di2015NewLine  [1-9][0-9]{3}Di2015NewLine  [1-7][0-9]{4}Di2015NewLine  8[0-5][0-9]{3}Di2015NewLine  86[0-3][0-9]{2}Di2015NewLine  86400Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCollapse adjacent powers of 10:Di2015NewLine  [0-9]{1,4}Di2015NewLine  [1-7][0-9]{4}Di2015NewLine  8[0-5][0-9]{3}Di2015NewLine  86[0-3][0-9]{2}Di2015NewLine  86400Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCombining the regexes above yields:Di2015NewLine  0*([0-9]{1,4}|[1-7][0-9]{4}|8[0-5][0-9]{3}|86[0-3][0-9]{2}|86400)Di2015NewLine

1910425Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void Navigate(string url, Action<Exception, UIElement> callback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Navigate(new Uri(url, UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute), callback);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Navigate(Uri uri, Action<Exception, UIElement> callback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (rootFrame == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Logger.LogMessage("Can't use navigation, because rootFrame is null");Di2015NewLine            ErrorMessageBox.Show(ClientStrings.NavigationFailed);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            NavigatedEventHandler successHandler = null;Di2015NewLine            NavigationFailedEventHandler failureHandler = null;Di2015NewLine            successHandler = (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                     rootFrame.Navigated -= successHandler;Di2015NewLine                     rootFrame.NavigationFailed -= failureHandler;Di2015NewLine                     if (callback != null)Di2015NewLine                     {Di2015NewLine                         callback(null, e.Content as UIElement);Di2015NewLine                     }Di2015NewLine                 };Di2015NewLine            failureHandler = (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    rootFrame.Navigated -= successHandler;Di2015NewLine                    rootFrame.NavigationFailed -= failureHandler;Di2015NewLine                    if (callback != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        callback(e.Exception, null);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine            rootFrame.Navigated += successHandler;Di2015NewLine            rootFrame.NavigationFailed += failureHandler;Di2015NewLine            rootFrame.Navigate(uri);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1911003Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class BitmapExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// See if bmp is contained in template with a small margin of error.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="template">The Bitmap that might contain.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="bmp">The Bitmap that might be contained in.</param>        Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>You guess!</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static bool Contains(this Bitmap template, Bitmap bmp)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const Int32 divisor = 4;Di2015NewLine        const Int32 epsilon = 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ExhaustiveTemplateMatching etm = new ExhaustiveTemplateMatching(0.9f);                      Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TemplateMatch[] tm = etm.ProcessImage(Di2015NewLine            new ResizeNearestNeighbor(template.Width / divisor, template.Height / divisor).Apply(template),Di2015NewLine            new ResizeNearestNeighbor(bmp.Width / divisor, bmp.Height / divisor).Apply(bmp)Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (tm.Length == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Rectangle tempRect = tm[0].Rectangle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Math.Abs(bmp.Width / divisor - tempRect.Width) < epsilonDi2015NewLine                &&Di2015NewLine                Math.Abs(bmp.Height / divisor - tempRect.Height) < epsilon)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

} }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Flags]Di2015NewLinepublic enum ProcessAccessRightsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    STANDARD_RIGHTS_REQUIRED = (0x000F0000),Di2015NewLine    DELETE = (0x00010000), // Required to delete the object. Di2015NewLine    READ_CONTROL = (0x00020000), // Required to read information in the security descriptor for the object, not including the information in the SACL. To read or write the SACL, you must request the ACCESS_SYSTEM_SECURITY access right. For more information, see SACL Access Right. Di2015NewLine    WRITE_DAC = (0x00040000), // Required to modify the DACL in the security descriptor for the object. Di2015NewLine    WRITE_OWNER = (0x00080000), // Required to change the owner in the security descriptor for the object. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PROCESS_ALL_ACCESS = STANDARD_RIGHTS_REQUIRED | SYNCHRONIZE | 0xFFF, //All possible access rights for a process object.Di2015NewLine    PROCESS_CREATE_PROCESS = (0x0080), // Required to create a process. Di2015NewLine    PROCESS_CREATE_THREAD = (0x0002), // Required to create a thread. Di2015NewLine    PROCESS_DUP_HANDLE = (0x0040), // Required to duplicate a handle using DuplicateHandle. Di2015NewLine    PROCESS_QUERY_INFORMATION = (0x0400), // Required to retrieve certain information about a process, such as its token, exit code, and priority class (see OpenProcessToken, GetExitCodeProcess, GetPriorityClass, and IsProcessInJob). Di2015NewLine    PROCESS_QUERY_LIMITED_INFORMATION = (0x1000),Di2015NewLine    PROCESS_SET_INFORMATION = (0x0200), // Required to set certain information about a process, such as its priority class (see SetPriorityClass). Di2015NewLine    PROCESS_SET_QUOTA = (0x0100), // Required to set memory limits using SetProcessWorkingSetSize. Di2015NewLine    PROCESS_SUSPEND_RESUME = (0x0800), // Required to suspend or resume a process. Di2015NewLine    PROCESS_TERMINATE = (0x0001), // Required to terminate a process using TerminateProcess. Di2015NewLine    PROCESS_VM_OPERATION = (0x0008), // Required to perform an operation on the address space of a process (see VirtualProtectEx and WriteProcessMemory). Di2015NewLine    PROCESS_VM_READ = (0x0010), // Required to read memory in a process using ReadProcessMemory. Di2015NewLine    PROCESS_VM_WRITE = (0x0020), // Required to write to memory in a process using WriteProcessMemory. Di2015NewLine    SYNCHRONIZE = (0x00100000), // Required to wait for the process to terminate using the wait functions. Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1911650Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const string SIBLING_WINDOW_CLASS = "NetUINativeHWNDHost";Di2015NewLinepublic delegate bool EnumChildCallback(IntPtr hwnd, ref IntPtr lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("User32.dll")]Di2015NewLinepublic static extern bool EnumChildWindows(IntPtr hWndParent, EnumChildCallback lpEnumFunc, ref IntPtr lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("User32.dll")]Di2015NewLinepublic static extern int GetClassName(IntPtr hWnd, StringBuilder lpClassName, int nMaxCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("user32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Auto, SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLinestatic extern int GetWindowText(IntPtr hWnd, StringBuilder lpString, int nMaxCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true, CharSet = CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLinestatic extern int GetWindowTextLength(IntPtr hWnd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static bool EnumChildProc(IntPtr hwndChild, ref IntPtr lParam)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder className = new StringBuilder(128);Di2015NewLine    GetClassName(hwndChild, className, 128);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int length = GetWindowTextLength(hwndChild);Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder windowText = new StringBuilder(length + 1);Di2015NewLine    GetWindowText(hwndChild, windowText, windowText.Capacity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (className.ToString() == "WUNDERBAR" && windowText.ToString() == "ToDoBar")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lParam = hwndChild;Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void OnStartupComplete(ref System.Array custom)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (_outlookApplication == null)Di2015NewLine        return; //We were not loaded into Outlook, so do nothingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get the instance of Outlook active explorer (= the main window) and start capturing selection changesDi2015NewLine    _outlookExplorer = _outlookApplication.ActiveExplorer();Di2015NewLine    _outlookExplorer.SelectionChange += new ExplorerEvents_10_SelectionChangeEventHandler(outlookExplorer_SelectionChange);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Find Outlook window handle (HWND)Di2015NewLine    IntPtr outlookWindow = FindOutlookWindow();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (outlookWindow == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Find ToDoBar window handleDi2015NewLine    IntPtr todoBarWindow = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    EnumChildCallback cb = new EnumChildCallback(EnumChildProc);Di2015NewLine    EnumChildWindows(outlookWindow, cb, ref todoBarWindow);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (todoBarWindow == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Find sibling window handle (HWND)Di2015NewLine    //Sibling window is the window which we are going to "cut" to make space for our own windowDi2015NewLine    IntPtr siblingWindow = SafeNativeMethods.FindWindowEx(todoBarWindow, IntPtr.Zero, SIBLING_WINDOW_CLASS, null);Di2015NewLine    if (siblingWindow == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Initialise PanelManager and assign own panel to itDi2015NewLine    _panelManager = new PanelManager(outlookWindow, siblingWindow);Di2015NewLine    _customPanel = new MyPanel();Di2015NewLine    _panelManager.ShowBarControl(_customPanel);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1911650Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ResizePanels()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (_changingSize)Di2015NewLine        return; //Prevent infinite loopsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    _changingSize = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Get size of the sibling window and main parent windowDi2015NewLine        Rectangle siblingRect = SafeNativeMethods.GetWindowRectangle(this.SiblingWindow);Di2015NewLine        Rectangle parentRect = SafeNativeMethods.GetWindowRectangle(this.ParentWindow);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Calculate position of sibling window in screen coordinatesDi2015NewLine        SafeNativeMethods.POINT topLeft = new SafeNativeMethods.POINT(siblingRect.Left, siblingRect.Top);Di2015NewLine        SafeNativeMethods.ScreenToClient(this.ParentWindow, ref topLeft);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Decrease size of the sibling windowDi2015NewLine        int newHeight = parentRect.Height - topLeft.Y - _panelContainer.Height;Di2015NewLine        SafeNativeMethods.SetWindowPos(this.SiblingWindow, IntPtr.Zero, 0, 0, siblingRect.Width, newHeight, SafeNativeMethods.SWP_NOMOVE | SafeNativeMethods.SWP_NOZORDER);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Move the bar to correct positionDi2015NewLine        _panelContainer.Left = topLeft.X;Di2015NewLine        _panelContainer.Top = topLeft.Y + newHeight;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Set correct height of the panel containerDi2015NewLine        _panelContainer.Width = siblingRect.Width;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _changingSize = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1916241Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TestHarnessDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var raiser = new SomeClass();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Emulate some event listenersDi2015NewLine        raiser.SomeEvent += (sender, e) => { Console.WriteLine("   Received event"); };Di2015NewLine        raiser.SomeEvent += (sender, e) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Bad listener!Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("   Blocking event");Di2015NewLine            System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(5000);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("   Finished blocking event");Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Listener who throws an exceptionDi2015NewLine        raiser.SomeEvent += (sender, e) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("   Received event, time to die!");Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Raise the event, see the effectsDi2015NewLine        raiser.DoSomething();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass SomeClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler SomeEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DoSomething()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        OnSomeEvent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnSomeEvent()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (SomeEvent != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var eventListeners = SomeEvent.GetInvocationList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Raising Event");Di2015NewLine            for (int index = 0;
