1919942Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing Timer=System.Threading.Timer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace LockTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Used by component's notification eventDi2015NewLine        private sealed class MyEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public string NotificationText { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Simple component implementation; fires notification event 500 msecs after previous notification event finishedDi2015NewLine        private sealed class MyComponentDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public MyComponent()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this._timer = new Timer(this.Notify, null, -1, -1); // not started yetDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void Start()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (this._lock)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!this._active)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        this._active = true;Di2015NewLine                        this._timer.Change(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(500d), TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1d));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void Stop()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (this._lock)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this._active = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public event EventHandler<MyEventArgs> Notification;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private void Notify(object ignore) // this will be invoked invoked in the context of a threadpool worker threadDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (this._lock)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!this._active) { return; }Di2015NewLine                    var notification = this.Notification; // make a local copyDi2015NewLine                    if (notification != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        notification(this, new MyEventArgs { NotificationText = "Now is " + DateTime.Now.ToString("o") });Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    this._timer.Change(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(500d), TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1d)); // rinse and repeatDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private bool _active;Di2015NewLine            private readonly object _lock = new object();Di2015NewLine            private readonly Timer _timer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Simple form to excercise our componentDi2015NewLine        private sealed class MyForm : FormDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public MyForm()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.Text = "UI Lock Demo";Di2015NewLine                this.AutoSize = true;Di2015NewLine                this.AutoSizeMode = AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var container = new FlowLayoutPanel { FlowDirection = FlowDirection.TopDown, Dock = DockStyle.Fill, AutoSize = true, AutoSizeMode = AutoSizeMode.GrowAndShrink };Di2015NewLine                this.Controls.Add(container);Di2015NewLine                this._status = new Label { Width = 300, Text = "Ready, press Start" };Di2015NewLine                container.Controls.Add(this._status);Di2015NewLine                this._component.Notification += this.UpdateStatus;Di2015NewLine                var button = new Button { Text = "Start" };Di2015NewLine                button.Click += (sender, args) => this._component.Start();Di2015NewLine                container.Controls.Add(button);Di2015NewLine                button = new Button { Text = "Stop" };Di2015NewLine                button.Click += (sender, args) => this._component.Stop();Di2015NewLine                container.Controls.Add(button);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private void UpdateStatus(object sender, MyEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (this.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Thread.Sleep(2000);Di2015NewLine                    this.Invoke(new EventHandler<MyEventArgs>(this.UpdateStatus), sender, args);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this._status.Text = args.NotificationText;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private readonly Label _status;Di2015NewLine            private readonly MyComponent _component = new MyComponent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Program entry point, runs event loop for the form that excercises out componentDi2015NewLine        public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Control.CheckForIllegalCrossThreadCalls = true;Di2015NewLine            Application.EnableVisualStyles();Di2015NewLine            using (var form = new MyForm())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Application.Run(form);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1919942Di2015UniqueSeparator        public void Start()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(delegate // addedDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (this._lock)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!this._active)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        this._active = true;Di2015NewLine                        this._timer.Change(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(500d), TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1d));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Stop()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(delegate // addedDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (this._lock)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this._active = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
1919942Di2015UniqueSeparator        public bool Start()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (0 == Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref this._active, 0, 0)) // will evaluate to true if we're not started; this is a variation on the double-checked locking pattern, without the problems associated with lack of memory barriers (see http://www.cs.umd.edu/~pugh/java/memoryModel/DoubleCheckedLocking.html)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (this._lock) // serialize all Start calls that are invoked on an un-started component from different threadsDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (this._active == 0) // make sure only the first Start call gets through to actual start, 2nd part of double-checked locking patternDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // run component startupDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        this._timer.Change(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(500d), TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1d));Di2015NewLine                        Interlocked.Exchange(ref this._active, 1); // now mark the component as successfully startedDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Stop()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Interlocked.Exchange(ref this._active, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Notify(object ignore) // this will be invoked invoked in the context of a threadpool worker threadDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (0 != Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref this._active, 0, 0)) // only handle the timer event in started components (notice the pattern is the same as in Start method except for the return value comparison)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (this._lock) // protect internal stateDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (this._active != 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var notification = this.Notification; // make a local copyDi2015NewLine                        if (notification != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            notification(this, new MyEventArgs { NotificationText = "Now is " + DateTime.Now.ToString("o") });Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        this._timer.Change(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(500d), TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1d)); // rinse and repeatDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int _active;Di2015NewLine

1922648Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DispatcherHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly DispatcherOperationCallback exitFrameCallback = ExitFrame;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Processes all UI messages currently in the message queue.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static void WaitForPriority()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create new nested message pump.Di2015NewLine        DispatcherFrame nestedFrame = new DispatcherFrame();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Dispatch a callback to the current message queue, when getting called,Di2015NewLine        // this callback will end the nested message loop.Di2015NewLine        // The priority of this callback should be lower than that of event message you want to process.Di2015NewLine        DispatcherOperation exitOperation = Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher.BeginInvoke(Di2015NewLine            DispatcherPriority.ApplicationIdle, exitFrameCallback, nestedFrame);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // pump the nested message loop, the nested message loop will immediatelyDi2015NewLine        // process the messages left inside the message queue.Di2015NewLine        Dispatcher.PushFrame(nestedFrame);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If the "exitFrame" callback is not finished, abort it.Di2015NewLine        if (exitOperation.Status != DispatcherOperationStatus.Completed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            exitOperation.Abort();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Object ExitFrame(Object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DispatcherFrame frame = state as DispatcherFrame;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Exit the nested message loop.Di2015NewLine        frame.Continue = false;Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1924056Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetDescription<T>(this object enumerationValue) where T : structDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type type = enumerationValue.GetType();Di2015NewLine    if (!type.IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("EnumerationValue must be of Enum type", "enumerationValue");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Tries to find a DescriptionAttribute for a potential friendly nameDi2015NewLine    //for the enumDi2015NewLine    MemberInfo[] memberInfo = type.GetMember(enumerationValue.ToString());Di2015NewLine    if (memberInfo != null && memberInfo.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object[] attrs = memberInfo[0].GetCustomAttributes(typeof (DescriptionAttribute), false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (attrs != null && attrs.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Pull out the description valueDi2015NewLine            return ( (DescriptionAttribute) attrs[0] ).Description;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //If we have no description attribute, just return the ToString of the enumDi2015NewLine    return enumerationValue.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1925719Di2015UniqueSeparatorInput basis: [0.2, 0.3, 0.3, 0.2]Di2015NewLineTotal prorate: 47Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine----Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineR used to indicate running total here:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineR = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFirst basis:Di2015NewLine  oldR = R [0]Di2015NewLine  R += (0.2 / 1.0 * 47) [= 9.4]Di2015NewLine  results[0] = int(R) - int(oldR) [= 9]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSecond basis:Di2015NewLine  oldR = R [9.4]Di2015NewLine  R += (0.3 / 1.0 * 47) [+ 14.1, = 23.5 total]Di2015NewLine  results[1] = int(R) - int(oldR) [23-9, = 14]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineThird basis:Di2015NewLine  oldR = R [23.5]Di2015NewLine  R += (0.3 / 1.0 * 47) [+ 14.1, = 37.6 total]Di2015NewLine  results[1] = int(R) - int(oldR) [38-23, = 15]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFourth basis:Di2015NewLine  oldR = R [37.6]Di2015NewLine  R += (0.2 / 1.0 * 47) [+ 9.4, = 47 total]Di2015NewLine  results[1] = int(R) - int(oldR) [47-38, = 9]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine9+14+15+9 = 47Di2015NewLine

1925951Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DictionaryComparer<TKey, TValue> : IEqualityComparer<Dictionary<TKey, TValue>> {    Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(Dictionary<TKey, TValue> x, Dictionary<TKey, TValue> y) {Di2015NewLine        if (x == null) {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("x");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (y == null) {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("y");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (x.Count != y.Count) {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }           Di2015NewLine        foreach (var kvp in x) {Di2015NewLine            TValue value;Di2015NewLine            if(!y.TryGetValue(kvp.Key, out value)) {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if(!kvp.Value.Equals(value)) {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(Dictionary<TKey, TValue> obj) {Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null) {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("obj");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        int hash = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var kvp in obj) {Di2015NewLine            hash = hash ^ kvp.Key.GetHashCode() ^ kvp.Value.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1925951Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool Contains(Di2015NewLine    List<Dictionary<string, object>> first,Di2015NewLine    List<Dictionary<string, object>> second) {Di2015NewLine    if(first == null) {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("first");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if(second == null) {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("second");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    IEqualityComparer<Dictionary<string, object>> comparer = new DictionaryComparer<string, object>();Di2015NewLine    return second.All(y => first.Contains(y, comparer));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1927245Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void ProcessRequest(HttpContext context)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine       context.Response.ContentType = "text/javascript";Di2015NewLine       context.Response.ContentEncoding = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // Get User IDDi2015NewLine        int user_id;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            user_id = int.Parse(context.Session["user_id"].ToString());Di2015NewLine        } catch {Di2015NewLine            WriteErrorObject(context,"Could not find required user in the session.");Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get QueryDi2015NewLine        string query;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            query = context.Request.QueryString["query"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(query)) throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine        } catch {Di2015NewLine            query = "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get RevisionDi2015NewLine        int revision;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            revision = int.Parse(ConfigurationManager.AppSettings["reportingRevision"]);Di2015NewLine        } catch {Di2015NewLine            revision = -1;   Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check for our connection stringDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            if (ConfigurationManager.ConnectionStrings["reportInstance"] == null) throw new Exception(); Di2015NewLine        } catch {Di2015NewLine            WriteErrorObject(context,"Cannot find the database connection string.");Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get our connection stringDi2015NewLine        string connectionstring = ConfigurationManager.ConnectionStrings["reportInstance"].ConnectionString;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create our sproc callerDi2015NewLine        StoredProc proc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            proc = new StoredProc("usp_rep2_agency_list",connectionstring,30);Di2015NewLine        } catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine            WriteErrorObject(context,"There was an exception creating the stored procedure caller: " + ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set up sprocDi2015NewLine        if (revision != -1) proc.AddParameter("@revision",revision,SqlDbType.Int);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        proc.AddParameter("@user_id",user_id,SqlDbType.Int);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (query != null && query.Length > 0) proc.AddParameter("@query",query,SqlDbType.NVarChar);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Execute sprocDi2015NewLine        DataSet results;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            results = (DataSet)proc.Execute(StoredProc.ExecuteTypes.ReturnDataset);Di2015NewLine        } catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine            WriteErrorObject(context,"There was an exception calling the stored procedure: " + ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            return;   Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check we have resultsDi2015NewLine        if (results == null) {Di2015NewLine            WriteErrorObject(context,"There was no dataset returned from the stored procedure.");Di2015NewLine            return;   Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check we have a tableDi2015NewLine        if (results.Tables.Count < 1) {Di2015NewLine            WriteErrorObject(context,"There was no tables found in the returned dataset from the stored procedure.");Di2015NewLine            return;   Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the tableDi2015NewLine        DataTable table = results.Tables[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Begin JSONDi2015NewLine        StringWriter writer = new StringWriter();Di2015NewLine        JsonWriter json = new JsonWriter(writer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        json.WriteStartObject();Di2015NewLine        json.WritePropertyName("success");Di2015NewLine        json.WriteValue(true);Di2015NewLine        json.WritePropertyName("count");Di2015NewLine        json.WriteValue(table.Rows.Count);Di2015NewLine        json.WritePropertyName("list");Di2015NewLine        json.WriteStartArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Process table rowsDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < table.Rows.Count; i++) {Di2015NewLine            // Get rowDi2015NewLine            DataRow row = table.Rows[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // IDDi2015NewLine            if (row["agency_id"] == null || row["agency_id"] == DBNull.Value) {Di2015NewLine                WriteErrorObject(context,"There was an error processing the agency id value from row " + i.ToString() + ".");Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int agency_id;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!int.TryParse(row["agency_id"].ToString(),out agency_id)) {Di2015NewLine                WriteErrorObject(context,"Could not parse the agency id value from row " + i.ToString() + ".");Di2015NewLine                return;   Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // NameDi2015NewLine            if (row["agency_name"] == null || row["agency_name"] == DBNull.Value) {Di2015NewLine                WriteErrorObject(context,"There was an error processing the agency name value from row " + i.ToString() + ".");Di2015NewLine                return;   Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string agency_name = row["agency_name"].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Write out JSON for this rowDi2015NewLine            json.WriteStartObject();Di2015NewLine            json.WritePropertyName("agency_id");Di2015NewLine            json.WriteValue(agency_id);Di2015NewLine            json.WritePropertyName("agency_name");Di2015NewLine            json.WriteValue(agency_name);Di2015NewLine            json.WritePropertyName("icon");Di2015NewLine            json.WriteValue("iq-reporting-dropdowns-agency");Di2015NewLine            json.WriteEndObject();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // End JSONDi2015NewLine        json.WriteEndArray();Di2015NewLine        json.WriteEndObject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string text = writer.GetStringBuilder().ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        context.Response.Write(text);Di2015NewLine        context.Response.Flush();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

run timeDi2015NewLinetimestampFirstRun = Settings.Default.FirstRun;Di2015NewLinetimestampLastRun = Settings.Default.LastRun;Di2015NewLinetimestampCurrentRun = GetEpochTime();Di2015NewLinenumberOfRuns static void BindClear(this ComboBox cbo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cbo.DataSource = null;Di2015NewLine        cbo.DataBindings.Clear();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Represents a <see cref="EnumPair"/> consisting of an value Di2015NewLine/// of an enum T and a string represantion of the value.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <remarks>Di2015NewLine/// With this generic class every <see cref="Enum"/> can beDi2015NewLine/// dynamically enhanced by additional values, such as an emptyDi2015NewLine/// entry, which is usefull in beeing used with Di2015NewLine/// <see cref="ComboBox"/>es.Di2015NewLine/// </remarks>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T">The type of the <see cref="Enum"/> to represent.</typeparam>Di2015NewLinepublic partial class EnumPair<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region ConstantsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public const string ValueMember = "EnumValue";Di2015NewLine    public const string DisplayMember = "EnumStringValue";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region ConstructorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="EnumPair"/> class.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public EnumPair()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type t = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        if (!t.IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Class EnumPair<T> can only be instantiated with Enum-Types!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="EnumPair"/> class.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">The value of the enum.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="stringValue">The <see cref="string"/> value of the enum.</param>Di2015NewLine    public EnumPair(T value, string stringValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type t = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        if (!t.IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Class EnumPair<T> can only be instantiated with Enum-Types!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.EnumValue = value;Di2015NewLine        this.EnumStringValue = stringValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region PropertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets or sets the value part of the <see cref="EnumPair"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public T EnumValue { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets or sets the string value of the <see cref="EnumPair"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public string EnumStringValue { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Returns a <see cref="string"/> that represents the current <see cref="EnumPair"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.EnumStringValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Generates a <see cref="List<T>"/> of the valuesDi2015NewLine    /// of the <see cref="Enum"/> T.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static List<EnumPair<T>> GetValuePairList()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<EnumPair<T>> list = new List<EnumPair<T>>();Di2015NewLine        EnumPair<T> pair = new EnumPair<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var item in Enum.GetValues(typeof(T)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            pair = new EnumPair<T>();Di2015NewLine            pair.EnumValue = (T)item;Di2015NewLine            pair.EnumStringValue = ((T)item).ToString();Di2015NewLine            list.Add(pair);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Implicit conversion from enum value to <see cref="EnumPair<>"/> from that enum.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">The enum value to convert to.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A <see cref="EnumPair<>"/> to the enum value.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static implicit operator EnumPair<T>(T e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type t = typeof(EnumPair<>).MakeGenericType(e.GetType());Di2015NewLine        return new EnumPair<T>((T)e, ((T)e).ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1932728Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass CompressorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] compress(byte[] buffer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        GZipStream zip = new GZipStream(ms, CompressionMode.Compress, true);Di2015NewLine        zip.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        zip.Close();Di2015NewLine        ms.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] compressed = new byte[ms.Length];Di2015NewLine        ms.Read(compressed, 0, compressed.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] gzBuffer = new byte[compressed.Length + 4];Di2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(compressed, 0, gzBuffer, 4, compressed.Length);Di2015NewLine        Buffer.BlockCopy(BitConverter.GetBytes(buffer.Length), 0, gzBuffer, 0, 4);Di2015NewLine        return gzBuffer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] decompress(byte[] gzBuffer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        int msgLength = BitConverter.ToInt32(gzBuffer, 0);Di2015NewLine        ms.Write(gzBuffer, 4, gzBuffer.Length - 4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[msgLength];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ms.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        GZipStream zip = new GZipStream(ms, CompressionMode.Decompress);Di2015NewLine        zip.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return buffer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1933879Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class TestPage : System.Web.UI.Page Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Random _random = new Random();Di2015NewLine    static List<string> lst = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!Page.IsPostBack)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i < size; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //26 letters in the alfabet, ascii + 65 for the capital lettersDi2015NewLine            builder.Append(Convert.ToChar(Convert.ToInt32(Math.Floor(26 * _random.NextDouble() + 65))));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
